story:
The TOZZI Peptide Injectable represents Total Exclusivity of Product and Revolutionizes the Aesthetic Industry with its Entry into the Injectable Skin Revitalizer Category. Facial Mesotherapy is well established in European Markets and Product Research of Amino Acid oriented Injectables is well developed and documented there. The TOZZI Peptide Injectable is the 'Missing Link' in the Chain of Anti-Aging Modalities. Skin Revitalizer Injectables are one of the Top Treatments of Choice for Celebrities Worldwide. Consumer demand is for more Natural Treatments and Products.

Previously, her Institute in Palm Beach Fl (view video) was flourishing as was her standing in the Industry when her illness halted her business. Along with her Fiance/Principal and Partner Steven Paul Crystal, they met when she was diagnosed and they created The TOZZI Collection to provide Paraben and Sulfate Free Skincare and Haircare with Peptide Technology. The TOZZI Peptide Injectable provides AminoPeptides, Antioxidants and is Hydration Rich in a Preservative Free/ Ph Balanced Formula to create a Fresh, Toned, Brighter Revitalized appearance immediately after treatment (Before & After Photos available on website) that other Aesthetic Injectables do not provide in the US Market. Peptide Technology has moved to the Forefront of Anti-Aging/Skincare. Now, The TOZZI Peptide Injectable with Carnosine, a Dipeptide that drives the sequence of 6 additional Amino Acids such as Arginine, Isoleucine, Leucine, Lysine, Methionine, Proline, DMAE, Glucosamine plus Pyriodoxine(B6) stimulates Fibroblast Cells to Naturally Fuel Collagen and Elastin that Create Dermal Density.

The TOZZI Peptide InjectableTreats the Total Face and may be administered to the Neck, Décolleté and Back of Hands. This Complements and Creates 'The Foundation'for other Aesthetic Procedures as well. The Target Market has greatly expanded specifically for The TOZZI Peptide Injectable as relates to people who are hesitant to try more invasive injectable treatments and is user friendly. You will appear 'Camera Ready' immediatly after your treatment. Contributors who choose The TOZZI Peptide Injectable Treatment will recieve their indivdual treatment with Donna TOZZI the Creator in coordination with a designated Medical Professionals office. (Note: Donna TOZZI will be available in Central & Southern California and you will recieve details directly from the Creator Donna TOZZI to facilitate your treatment. For Contributors outside of California, special arrangements can be made to accommodate). Flexible dates will be granted for contributors requesting The TOZZI Peptide Injectable. The Patent-Pending Formula Components are all Natural and are FDA approved individually to provide Nutrition for Healthy Skin. The TOZZI Peptide Injectable is Prepared at our designated Compound Pharmacy in California. Donna Tozzi's vision is to provide this Treatment as well in the field of Oncology Aesthetics. Please view www.tozzicollection.com

 Donna Marie TOZZI RN, BSN is a Pioneer and Inventor in the Aesthetic Medical Industry. Donna TOZZI'S Passion for Classic Skincare Beauty has been influenced by her extensive training in Milan Italy and through her Practice at The TOZZI Institute in Palm Beach, Fl. Donna is well established in the Industry with accolades in publications such as NewBeauty, InStyle, Elle and Lucky.

During the Development Phase which includes the Patent Filings for The TOZZI Peptide Injectable, Donna waged her own personal battle with a rare cancer. Through this experience as an Independent Business Woman and Entrepreneur she has a unique perspective that will lead her in the advancement of Oncology Aesthetics.                                                                                                                                                            

 It is our great pleasure to share with our Contributors the Launch of The TOZZI Peptide Injectable and The TOZZI Collection. The TOZZI Peptide Injectable which represents Total Exclusivity of Product will Revolutionize the Anti-Aging Industry. Contributors will be the FIRST to be offered The TOZZI Peptide Injectable and The TOZZI Collection of Skincare & Haircare Products. Browse the Products below  designated as PERKS to treat yourself and or give a gift to Friends & Family. Note: all products  below are available in addition to those designated as perks. You will enjoy discounts on these as well. Thank you for your interest in The TOZZI Collection. 

We are Market Ready and our Funding Goal of $100,000 is geared towards Production, Promotion, Media Selection and Public Relations exposure. As indicated our Dual Patent Pending TOZZI Peptide Injectable is Market Ready and the Development of a National Network of Medical Professionals is  targeted. Donna Tozzi RN,BSN is the Inventor who battled a rare cancer throughout the development process and has successfully met every challenge along the way.

successfully met every challenge along the way.

story:
Short Summary

Hello friends, my name is Yinka Oshin, I am a Christian Entrepreneur, an author and a researcher. I am passionate about using creativity and innovative strategies to inspire and change lives. 

I have written a number of books that include Judge Theo – The Final Judgment, God Has Got Talent – ME, and How to Become Debt Free by Discovering Your Talent – A Seven Steps Model. 

I am the Editor of The Talent Journal, a media publication designed to provide inspiration for others to discover their talent and turn it into wealth, www.thetalentjournal.com.

Wellbeing Ludo, A - Z Handbook of Health and Wellbeing and Discover a Healthy Lifestyle is a 3-in-1 concept to support efforts to combat obesity, drug & alcohol abuse, other public health concerns and promote the discovery of a healthy lifestyle.

Wellbeing Ludo is a family favourite board game that creates fun and a family bonding agent. It is simple, safe and enjoyable to play; and a forum to socialise with friends, discover health and wellbeing. 

A - Z Handbook of Health and Wellbeing is a wealth of information facilitating a pro-active approach to a healthy lifestyle. This is a compilation from A - Z featuring healthy eating options, physical activities to keep fit, vital human anatomical parts and an overview of symptoms of public health diseases. It is colour coded to aid ease of understanding and has key action points to stimulate a positive response from the reader. A unique contribution to create increased awareness and promote discovery of a healthy lifestyle. 

Discover a Healthy Lifestyle is an interactive forum designed to 

  • Provide resources and information
  • Create awareness
  • Facilitate action
to improve the health and wellbeing of members. 

We are running this campaign to raise funds to produce Wellbeing Ludo, write and publish A - Z Handbook of Health and Wellbeing. The designs for Wellbeing Ludo are been made, with a few finishing touches to be completed; we have identified suppliers for the playing pieces and a manufacturer to print and package complete sets of the board game. 

Work has started on research, collating materials and writing A - Z Handbook of Health and Wellbeing. The handbook will be jointly written with Dr (Mrs) Christy Iyaniwura, a Masters in Public Health graduate from London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine; she trained as a medical practitioner and public health researcher.      

Every funding received will assist us to turn this project into reality; provide an opportunity for this project to contribute to efforts to address public health concerns like obesity, drug & alcohol abuse. 

What We Need & What You Get

Our target is £9750.00 about 70% of the funding will be used to print and package complete sets of Wellbeing Ludo and A - Z Handbook of Health and Wellbeing to market. About 15% of the funding will be used to sustain a social media marketing campaign.

Some of the perks for funders that support us include: your personal copy of Wellbeing Ludo & A - Z Handbook of Health and Wellbeing - Digital or Printed, A - Z handbook of Health and Wellbeing Poster, Discover a Healthy Lifestyle branded Skipping Ropes, Gym Sack, Water Bottle,  Beach Towel, Beach Volley Ball, Annual Membership Plan of Discover a Healthy Lifestyle website, Sponsor An Alphabet Package!

Enhance Your Reward - Sponsor An Alphabet

You can enhance your reward by choosing the perk Sponsor an Alphabet in the A - Z Handbook of Health and Wellbeing. With this perk, your business receives the opportunity to place an advert (quarter size of the page) on an odd page linked to your chosen alphabet. 

In the digital edition, your advert will be hyperlinked to your chosen website. In addition, your advert is included in a Centre Spread of all Sponsor An Alphabet Adverts and you get Extra Complimentary copies of the Handbook.

In addition to the 26 Alphabets, there are 4 Premium locations available under the sponsorship package:  

  • Front Cover - Will get Extra 20 copies of the Handbook
  • Back Cover - Will get Extra 15 copies of the Handbook
  • Inside Front Cover - Will get Extra 10 copies of the Handbook 
  • Inside Back Cover - Will get Extra 10 copies of the Handbook
  • Each Alphabet - Will get Extra 5 copies of the Handbook

Each Alphabet will get Extra 5 copies of the Handbook and all Sponsor An Alphabet adverts will also get extra 5 copies of Wellbeing Ludo sets. 

Some added benefits you get with the Sponsor An Alphabet Package include:   

  • Engaging with your Customers
  • Getting a unique exposure to reach a wider Market
  • Promoting Health and Wellbeing

All adverts that will be submitted under the Sponsor An Alphabet Package must meet acceptable international advertising standards and must not contain material that is unlawful, obscene, defamatory, libellous, threatening, pornographic, harassing, hateful, racially or ethnically offensive, or encourages conduct that would be considered a criminal offence, give rise to civil liability, violate any law, or is otherwise inappropriate. A full terms and conditions will be provided to all Sponsors.  

We hope with your support, we will reach and surpass our funding, but in the event we don't reach our funding goal, we intend to use the raised funds to produce a limited edition of Wellbeing Ludo and A - Z Handbook of Health and Wellbeing. 

    The Impact

    As you play Wellbeing Ludo you will encounter these innovative tiles  

    1. Wellbeing Assessment Zone = Miss A Turn - Take time out and have regular checkup of your wellbeing & health status indicators.
    2. Wellbeing Alert Area = Return to Base - Health warning signs are prompts for you to seek professional care and support.
    3. Wellbeing Status Indicator = Move Forward 2 Spaces - A good wellbeing & health status indicator should motivate you to achieve more.

    The playing pieces are sport themed to stimulate people to take action and discover health, fun and wellbeing! 

    A - Z Handbook of Health and Wellbeing is colour coded to aid ease of understanding and has key action points to stimulate a positive response from the reader. Other Features of the Handbook include well researched articles on health and wellbeing issues with illustrative photographs. A unique contribution to create increased awareness and promote discovery of a healthy lifestyle. 

    Features on Health and Wellbeing Charities

    As a demonstration of our commitment to promote health and wellbeing, we will provide some health and wellbeing charities with an opportunity for a write up to feature their activities to be included in the A - Z Handbook of Health and Wellbeing.    

    Your support for this project will make a big difference in turning this 2-in-1 discover a healthy lifestyle project into a reality. Thank you for believing in us and the project. 

    Risks & Challenges

    There are some risks and obstacles associated with publishing which include ability to keep to the editorial timeline and managing different third party service providers. 

    I am a published author and very conversant with these challenges; I have written over 10 books till date and currently the Editor of The Talent Journal. I will ensure all aspects of the project are adequately monitored and maintain a regular line of communication with third party service providers to ensure the project is delivered within agreed timescales.     

    Other Ways You Can Help

    • Please share this project with your families, friends, colleagues, social media contacts; every little support counts to the success of this campaign. 
    • You can use Indiegogo share tools to spread the news!

    • Thank you for your support!

story:
Who We Are

   I Challenge Diabetes is a non-profit organization devoted to helping those with Type 1 Diabetes, or T1D for short. This form of diabetes has no known cure, and its causes are unknown to us still. What we do know is that this form of diabetes is something that changes our lives. 
   Often, people allow diabetic frustrations, stigma's, or other negative stresses negatively impact their day to day lives. Adolescents, in particular, feel powerless because of their diabetes, and they live under a blanket of what they think they cannot do. Youth, as impressionable individuals, need to be guided into developing healthy habits with their diabetes, as these habits can ideally stay with them for their lifetimes. 
   This problem is among some of the most dangerous within the realm of diabetes; it often leads to a passive form of therapy, or simply for individuals to not care about their diabetes, which translates to their short and long term health.
    

 

Chris Jarvis is a T1D who rowed in the 2004 Summer Olympics in Athens, who also represented Team Canada in the Pan-Am Games and other various competitions on the world stage. He was among the Mens Eight Canadian Rowing Team that were undefeated on said world stage during 2004 rowing season.
   Knowing that there are T1D's who allow their diabetes to prevent them from doing day to day tasks, Chris started I Challenge Diabetes in 2007, in hopes enabling those to live full lives with their condition. 
   Since then, I Challenge Diabetes has expanded, from its starting point in Ontario, to three other provinces: British Colombia, Alberta and Quebec. Since then, we have reached out to over 15,000 participants across Canada. Since then, I Challenge Diabetes has shared successes with these participants, from as young as three to those in the senior years, and is proud to say that Chris's original goal is being met daily.

Why We Are Raising Funds

   I Challenge Diabetes is looking for your support so that we can expand our mentorship. 
   Currently, we are the only diabetes devoted organization in the world who does what we do; our world-renowned leaders work tirelessly, for free, to aid youth and adolescent individuals with diabetes through a variety of sport, which include canoeing, hiking, cave-exploration and even rock-climbing. 
   With that in mind, our goals are to have more programs in new and existing areas, such as Manitoba and Alberta, respectively.   To do this, we need to have the required capital. We aim to advertise what we do in as many Diabetes Care Clinics as possible, and with your support, we can create strong communities all over Canada.


   "It's so nice to go to on trips and adventures like this with a group of people with diabetes! The leaders are so fun and knowledgeable about everything, and help to give everyone such a great experience regardless of the activity."
 -Karsen O'Hare, adult with T1D



   Our programs are unique; for example, when a teenager with diabetes is pushed into our programs by their parent(s), the teen often comes back for more! We experience a 95% return rate amongst our participants, which is significantly more than other organizations that run similar programs. In addition, we challenge our participants to move out of their comfort zones and try something new and fun, in a safe setting, then relate it back to diabetes with them. If they can find success with the challenge that our programs provide then they can apply the learning process to their diabetes management.



   

 

  "Thanks for an absolutely wonderful event. My son really enjoyed it and we learned a lot. Since diagnosis in February we have had a lot of challenges getting him to engage and this event was a huge boost to his moral. I can't wait for the next time ICD comes to our area. "
-Martin Ritchie, father of a youth with T1D

  “On behalf of the Windsor Medical Program, I would like to express my gratitude for a wonderful session you undertook with our second year medical students on Sept. 30th 2010...You provided important insight to our young doctors of the future how to support and nurture our patients with type 1 diabetes.” 
-R. Cheung MD, FRCPC, Course Coordinator for Endocrinology, Assistant Professor Dept. of Medicine (Endocrinology), Schulich School of Medicine and Dentistry, The University of Western Ontario, after Chris's Guest Lecture at UOWO's Faculty of Medicine

Risks & Challenges

   There are some very great challenges associated with expanding I Challenge Diabetes into new provinces. There are some other facets that need to be worked on:
   -A stronger team. There is always room to grow.
   -Helping is impossible to those who refuse to be helped.

   With that in mind, having your support can help to grow faster and more efficiently than ever before - We can train our leaders to become better than they already are, and we can reach out to as many people as we possibly can. A growing community can encourage those who haven't wanted help, as well. 

   Your help, whether it be one dollar or fifty dollars, will go directly towards I Challenge Diabetes' expansion.

story:
At PIGA, we believe it is every human being’s birthright to be able to stand tall and move freely to explore new possibilities. We are on a mission to bring novel solutions to people who wish to be active and pursue their sports and activities with greater comfort and stability.

PigaONE is the first minimalist footwrap for barefoot activities that snugly support your arch, improve your posture and overall performance.

We invite you to learn more about this new category of footwear and contribute what you can to make it happen. Informed and committed, we are all in this together!

We did it. We invented the first non-skid sole footwrap that’s infused with our gentle yet effective arch-support patent-pending technology — that truly supports you to build stronger, healthier feet – for improved sports performance and well-being. We did it because too many people need to feel safely grounded, balanced or even relieved from sore feet while engaging in barefoot sports and activities.

But we need your help to bring PigaONE into the market and on your feet.

 

Grip socks and other non-skid sole barefoot footwear were until now the go-to option for your favorite barefoot sport or activity. PigaONE is a natural solution to help you stay in control and maintain your balance while engaging in barre, Pilates, yoga, dance, SUP, martial arts, as well as a tool for post-activity recovery, help you stay comfortably on your feet all day; whether at the studio, the gym, on land and even on the water.

Our feet are the most used, and probably the least taken care of part of the body. If the muscles of the feet aren’t working properly to hold the bones of the feet, then nothing stacked above is aligned correctly either. A lot is going on when people train barefoot: improperly balanced and supported feet affect the whole body - not to mention heavy legs, sweaty feet and other injuries that may hamper your trainings, and make your sports suffer. We took care of all of that when designing PigaONE.

 

There are greener pastures with PigaONE, a breakthrough in barefoot footwear that supports your active lifestyle (and of course your feet). Created with the foot in mind, from the heels and toes right down to the muscles and tendons, PigaONEs aren’t meant to just protect and keep you securely grounded. It stays busy by also stabilizing and supporting your feet while providing light compression that stays put while you move, take care of your sweaty feet and even foot injuries that may sometimes hamper your trainings.

PigaONE integrates the dual action PostureForce© System combining the foot-strengthening arch-support technology + adjustable heel foot positioning attachment.

Infused with this gentle yet effective arch-support patent-pending technology, PigaONE provides perfect stability and control that builds from the inside-out. It’s surprisingly easy to improve your foot strength while wearing PigaONE and to amplify the benefits of your favorite barefoot activity. Now you can effortlessly let PigaONE do the work while you train and perform to your full potential.

It's like a slip-on teacher that educates your feet to work properly, and the best part is that you get to keep the gains you've made once you take them off.

It’s barefoot, but better.

At PIGA, we are on a mission to create smart footwear that shapes to your foot and feels barefoot at the same time!

 

 

 

We wanted to create a fully supportive and adjustable footwrap that would surpass what’s on the market today. We were fully determined to offer you a new option with our unprecedented barefoot footwrap that would truly bring your barefoot sports to another level.

 

Your body does the work, thanks to the built-in PostureForce technology of PigaONE that improves its innate ability to engage postural reflexes during barefoot activities thru neuromuscular activation.  

The neuromuscular foot activation power of PigaONE works by stimulating the plantar arch of the foot thru proprioception. Nerve endings in this part of the foot are responsible for transmitting stimuli to the brain. The stimulation provided by PigaONE triggers the body’s intrinsic balance system, modifying the center of gravity to its optimal position.

 

PIGA is a new category of product introducing flexible arch support that work quite the contrary to traditional arch supports that are frequently prescribed to reduce foot pain. By pushing deeply into the arch of the foot, these prevent the muscles and ligaments from being stretched (and moving freely) and thus do reduce the pain but they can weaken the muscles and ligaments in the feet.  

On the contrary, the supportive design and non-intrusive flexible and adjustable arch support gently stimulates the arch of your feet to build the internal muscles from within, and the best part is that you get to keep the gain you've made even when you take them off.

At first, PigaONE was designed with Yoga and Pilates practitioners in mind. The team started by putting all the substitute footwear and socks on the table and improved on all the important aspects of what people would want to find in a barefoot sports footgear: support, compression, grippyness, comfort, washability, versatility.

We started to develop the outer shell of PigaONE first, as it had to be able to perfectly be designed not only to integrate the extra features but to also the novel patent-pending flexible and adjustable arch-support system.

The PigaONE team spent the last 2 years carefully engineering and validating the flexible arch-support patent-pending technology that powers it. Together with it's unique design, it enables you to dynamically adjust your feet position and gently anchor them on the ground. The result is better balance and stability, for a practice that's well grounded and in control.

 

We did a clinical trial which demonstrated that 90% of participants had improved balance while wearing PigaONE. Improving weight bearing points positioning of the feet on the ground meant better floor anchoring and reduced oscillation of the center of gravity. The upper body result is less energy loss and compensation while maintaining balance that leads to better movement availability and amplitude as well as enhanced global posture.

Below are videos demonstrating the contact surface area of the feet on the ground while walking – the first one barefoot and the second one while wearing PigaONE (this analysis used Win-Track, a gate-analysis plate).

You will notice that video 2 shows an improvement of weight-bearing are of the feet while wearing PigaONE, which means improved contact-surface with the ground (low contact look blue, while higher contact-surface look red).

Video 1 - Barefoot

Video 2 - Wearing PigaONE

 

This entrepreneurial women-made story started with Sandra, PigaONE’s founder, and dedicated ambassador. Sandra tried just about every barefoot footwear to stay safely grounded, balanced and relieve her sore feet to improve her Pilates practice. But with sweaty feet, heavy legs, and plantar fasciitis, she couldn’t find any footwear that truly felt barefoot - so she invented it.

Sandra started in 2015 and spent the next 2 years developing PigaONE. She and her team created 18 prototypes before they found the perfect design. Along the way, Sandra met Julie the podiatrist, and soon to be close friend. Together, Sandra and Julie developed the arch-support technology behind PigaONE. The product has undergone rigorous product validation with yoga and pilates practitioners.

Once the product was finished, Julie ran a clinical trial in 2016 with a small group of women to confirm the efficacy of PigaONE. With the overwhelming success of the clinical trial helping 90% of participants, Julie and Sandra are now releasing PigaONE to everyone!

Although we have reached our initial financial goal, our mission is far from over. Every extra penny will be used to accelerate the development of other supportive barefoot footwear and carry out further testing of the efficiency and application of our flexible and adjustable arch-support patent-pending technology.

PigaONE is the first of a series of revolutionary barefoot balance activation systems to be created by Sandra and Julie. They are on a mission to offer smart footwear that shapes to your foot and feels barefoot at the same time. They are currently actively developing two other products for barefoot athletes.

 

PigaONE is available in 5 sizes ranging from women’s 5 – 11.5 and men’s 7 – 12.5 (US sizes).

We recommend to go a size up if you have wide feet, and to go size down if you have narrow feet. Here are 2 examples:

1) Mary wears a size US 6 and has wide feet, so she chooses size US 7 (M - medium)
2) Bob wears a size US 12 and has narrow feet, so he chooses size US 11 (XXL - xxlarge)

PigaONE is a natural solution to help you stay in control and maintain your balance while engaging in barre, Pilates, yoga, dance, SUP, martial arts, as well as a tool for post-activity recovery, help you stay comfortably on your feet all day; whether at the studio, the gym, on land and even on the water.Our feet are the most used, and probably the least taken care of part of the body. If the muscles of the feet aren’t working properly to hold the bones of the feet, then nothing stacked above is aligned correctly either. A lot is going on when people train barefoot: improperly balanced and supported feet affect the whole body - not to mention heavy legs, sweaty feet and other injuries that may hamper your trainings, and make your sports suffer. We took care of all of that when designing PigaONE. There are greener pastures with PigaONE, a breakthrough in barefoot footwear that supports your active lifestyle (and of course your feet). Created with the foot in mind, from the heels and toes right down to the muscles and tendons, PigaONEs aren’t meant to just protect and keep you securely grounded. It stays busy by also stabilizing and supporting your feet while providing light compression that stays put while you move, take care of your sweaty feet and even foot injuries that may sometimes hamper your trainings.PigaONE integrates the dual action PostureForce© System combining the foot-strengthening arch-support technology + adjustable heel foot positioning attachment.Infused with this gentle yet effective arch-support patent-pending technology, PigaONE provides perfect stability and control that builds from the inside-out. It’s surprisingly easy to improve your foot strength while wearing PigaONE and to amplify the benefits of your favorite barefoot activity. Now you can effortlessly let PigaONE do the work while you train and perform to your full potential.It's like a slip-on teacher that educates your feet to work properly, and the best part is that you get to keep the gains you've made once you take them off.It’s barefoot, but better.At PIGA, we are on a mission to create smart footwear that shapes to your foot and feels barefoot at the same time!   We wanted to create a fully supportive and adjustable footwrap that would surpass what’s on the market today. We were fully determined to offer you a new option with our unprecedented barefoot footwrap that would truly bring your barefoot sports to another level. Your body does the work, thanks to the built-in PostureForce technology of PigaONE that improves its innate ability to engage postural reflexes during barefoot activities thru neuromuscular activation.  The neuromuscular foot activation power of PigaONE works by stimulating the plantar arch of the foot thru proprioception. Nerve endings in this part of the foot are responsible for transmitting stimuli to the brain. The stimulation provided by PigaONE triggers the body’s intrinsic balance system, modifying the center of gravity to its optimal position. PIGA is a new category of product introducing flexible arch support that work quite the contrary to traditional arch supports that are frequently prescribed to reduce foot pain. By pushing deeply into the arch of the foot, these prevent the muscles and ligaments from being stretched (and moving freely) and thus do reduce the pain but they can weaken the muscles and ligaments in the feet.  On the contrary, the supportive design and non-intrusive flexible and adjustable arch support gently stimulates the arch of your feet to build the internal muscles from within, and the best part is that you get to keep the gain you've made even when you take them off.At first, PigaONE was designed with Yoga and Pilates practitioners in mind. The team started by putting all the substitute footwear and socks on the table and improved on all the important aspects of what people would want to find in a barefoot sports footgear: support, compression, grippyness, comfort, washability, versatility.We started to develop the outer shell of PigaONE first, as it had to be able to perfectly be designed not only to integrate the extra features but to also the novel patent-pending flexible and adjustable arch-support system.The PigaONE team spent the last 2 years carefully engineering and validating the flexible arch-support patent-pending technology that powers it. Together with it's unique design, it enables you to dynamically adjust your feet position and gently anchor them on the ground. The result is better balance and stability, for a practice that's well grounded and in control. We did a clinical trial which demonstrated that 90% of participants had improved balance while wearing PigaONE. Improving weight bearing points positioning of the feet on the ground meant better floor anchoring and reduced oscillation of the center of gravity. The upper body result is less energy loss and compensation while maintaining balance that leads to better movement availability and amplitude as well as enhanced global posture.Below are videos demonstrating the contact surface area of the feet on the ground while walking – the first one barefoot and the second one while wearing PigaONE (this analysis used Win-Track, a gate-analysis plate).You will notice that video 2 shows an improvement of weight-bearing are of the feet while wearing PigaONE, which means improved contact-surface with the ground (low contact look blue, while higher contact-surface look red).Video 1 - BarefootVideo 2 - Wearing PigaONE

 
This entrepreneurial women-made story started with Sandra, PigaONE’s founder, and dedicated ambassador. Sandra tried just about every barefoot footwear to stay safely grounded, balanced and relieve her sore feet to improve her Pilates practice. But with sweaty feet, heavy legs, and plantar fasciitis, she couldn’t find any footwear that truly felt barefoot - so she invented it.Sandra started in 2015 and spent the next 2 years developing PigaONE. She and her team created 18 prototypes before they found the perfect design. Along the way, Sandra met Julie the podiatrist, and soon to be close friend. Together, Sandra and Julie developed the arch-support technology behind PigaONE. The product has undergone rigorous product validation with yoga and pilates practitioners.Once the product was finished, Julie ran a clinical trial in 2016 with a small group of women to confirm the efficacy of PigaONE. With the overwhelming success of the clinical trial helping 90% of participants, Julie and Sandra are now releasing PigaONE to everyone!Although we have reached our initial financial goal, our mission is far from over. Every extra penny will be used to accelerate the development of other supportive barefoot footwear and carry out further testing of the efficiency and application of our flexible and adjustable arch-support patent-pending technology.PigaONE is the first of a series of revolutionary barefoot balance activation systems to be created by Sandra and Julie. They are on a mission to offer smart footwear that shapes to your foot and feels barefoot at the same time. They are currently actively developing two other products for barefoot athletes. PigaONE is available in 5 sizes ranging from women’s 5 – 11.5 and men’s 7 – 12.5 (US sizes).We recommend to go a size up if you have wide feet, and to go size down if you have narrow feet. Here are 2 examples:1) Mary wears a size US 6 and has wide feet, so she chooses size US 7 (M - medium)2) Bob wears a size US 12 and has narrow feet, so he chooses size US 11 (XXL - xxlarge)

story:
Meet the Plasma Mini.

The new-age wearable air purifier that combines Bipolar Ionization Technology with a fan to eliminate airborne contaminants.

We’re not mincing words:

Source: World Health Organization & Smart Air Filters

Now sure, we can’t purify the world’s air in one fell swoop... But we can mitigate these risks with better day-to-day solutions. Especially considering that your standard wearable ionizing purifier doesn’t even eliminate contaminants; it merely forces them down onto nearby surfaces where they remain a threat! We think that simply isn’t good enough. Wouldn’t you agree?

When you hike up a mountain or walk along the shore and take a BIG breathe – that air is incredibly fresh. That’s because natural elements like the sun, lightning, and waves help create positive and negative ions to clean the air. As we move closer and closer to the city, the freshness drops and so do the ions.

 

Our lovely little device essentially uses a two-step process:

(1) Release positive and negative ions into the air

& (2) Spread them out with a miniature fan.

Once airborne, these ions seek out airborne contaminants and fully break them down — much like heat-seeking missiles track down their targets. So while you’re going about your day, wearing your Quair Plasma Mini, this is what that’ll look like:

In other words: It’ll look like overall improved air quality.

Our positive and negative ions also induce a chemical reaction that extracts Hydrogen from viruses and bacteria. But viruses and bacteria need Hydrogen to survive, so this effectively breaks them down. That Hydrogen (H) than pairs with another byproduct of this reaction — (OH) — to form harmless H20 water particles.

With regards to those volatile organic compounds, our ions pair them with oxygen (i.e. they “oxidize” them) to a similar effect: breaking them down into gases that are natural to air (oxygen, nitrogen, CO2).

It’s much better than simply dropping bacteria down onto nearby surfaces, isn’t it? Instead, those harmful particles are eliminated outright; no air filter necessary. See how the Quair Plasma Mini outperforms negative ionizers in the market. 

Purify a radius of 30cm, the perfect buffer to protect your breathing area.

DOES NOT produce harmful levels of ozone like most other portable ion-based purifiers. The Plasma Mini falls well below FDA and EPA upper limits for ozone emission (in accordance to IEC 60335-2-65:2002+A1:2008+A2:2015) to keep your lungs safe and healthy.

Take it with you anywhere with the comfortable silicone neck strap and super lightweight device, weighing only 85g.

Get fresh air throughout your day with 8 to 10 hours of battery life on a 2-hour charge via USB Type-C.

Enjoy the sleek, minimalistic design, and choose your favorite device color and add-on accessories: colored neck strap options, protective case, and a shirt clip.

While the initial inspiration may have been to help out our loved ones, we quickly realized it could helpful to:

And everyone concerned with the state of their health. Which, in this crazy day and age, may as well be all of us.

 

 

We’re Thomas, Jason, & Andy — three colleagues who looked at the “new normal” of pandemic times and thought: How can we help our friends and families stay safe as the world opens back up?

So while some people spent lockdown perfecting their sourdough recipes, we spent ours working closely with air purification experts. The result? A new-age wearable purifier that eliminates airborne bacteria in close proximity.

Right now, we’re all aching to get back to some semblance of “normal.” But we’re also hyper-aware of the risks that “normal” entails. It’s a tough seesaw to balance.

That’s why we need solutions like the Quair Plasma Mini. As things slowly open back up — as social bubbles expand and travel restrictions cease and more restaurants reopen their doors — we’ll want that added layer of protection. We’ll want to worry less and live more.

So whether you’re an essential worker, a concerned citizen, or anyone in between — let’s come together, take a deep breath, and make the world a little safer.

 

Sources

Talhelm, T. (2020, October 30). What Are Ionizer Air Purifiers and Do They Work? Retrieved 2020, from https://smartairfilters.com/en/blog/ionizer-air... 

secretariat, CCAC. “World Health Organization Releases New Global Air Pollution Data.” Climate & Clean Air Coalition, 2 May 2018, ccacoalition.unep.ecedi.typhon.net/en/news/world-health-organization-releases-new-global-air-pollution-data

Lindmeier, Christian. “WHO Launches New Global Influenza Strategy.” World Health Organization, World Health Organization, 11 Mar. 2019, www.who.int/news/item/11-03-2019-who-launches-n....

Staff, EPA. “Ozone Generators That Are Sold as Air Cleaners.” EPA, Environmental Protection Agency, 28 Sept. 2020,

story:
Slick Aguilar, lead guitarist for Jefferson Starship since ‘92 (before that, David Crosby Band and KC & The Sunshine Band!) needs a liver tranaplant. He has brought tremendous joy to the world through his music. He must go to a different state from where he currently lives for this operation. Living expenses will be large for the 6-8 months he will be there. There will be many out of pocket expenses that insurance will not cover. Please help if you can. Thanks!

Slick has been the lead guitarist in Jefferson Starship since 1992 and is only the 3rd person to hold that position in the 40 year history of both Jefferson Airplane and Jefferson Starship. This year marks 28 years Slick has played with Paul Kantner, Marty Balin, and Company since he started with The KBC band in 1984. Before that he was lead guitarist with DAVID CROSBY and before that, KC & THE SUNSHINE BAND. His lead guitar has soared the music of JEFFERSON AIRPLANE & JEFFERSON STARSHIP far longer than the AIRPLANE’s legendary JORMA KAUKONEN and STARSHIP’s CRAIG CHAQUICO combined.

http://www.classichitsandoldies.com/v2/2012/11/26/jefferson-starships-slick-aguilar-needs-a-liver-transplant-is-seeking-help-with-medical-expenses/

 

http://www.jambands.com/news/2012/11/07/jefferson-starship-s-mark-slick-aguilar-in-need-of-a-liver-transplant

 

http://www.facebook.com/MarkSlickAguilar

 

ABC New Radio with Slick December 2012:

http://www.96kzel.com/common/more.php?m=58&article=7B3EF35758BA11E2B03FFEFDADE6840A&mode=2

 

Slick Aguilar Wellness Fund Concert 2-24-13:

http://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10200255706460003&set=o.450131541710900&type=1&theater

 

Slick's great new website-Lots of great swag there in exchange for a donation:

http://slickaguilar.com/

story:
WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT!


*Millions of dollars have gone into researching this long kept secret
*Proven to reduce stress & anxiety
*Proven to increase focus & awareness
*Naturally balances mood and sleep patterns
*Absolutely NO crash 
*Repairs your skin, hair, nails, and even helps with hearing eye sight 
*Helps to bring colorful and lucid dreams
*Safe and effective with NO side effects 
*Can be used everyday as often as you like


  Help us bring ORMUS to you!

We need $21,000 USD to get the secret of ORMUS out into the public and over to you. ORMUS has helped a ton of people who not only come back for more, but end up buying bottles for friends and family. But currently it is only sold through our website, and we need your support to get ORMUS into the public and out to you! Here is the first three phases where the money will go...

PHASE 1: Packaging. This includes miron glass bottles and professionally designed labels. Why Miron glass? ORMUS is a special product, there is no other product like it. And it needs to be protected. Miron glass is the only glass in the world that blocks the entire spectrum of light frequency. This protection is so important because the ORMUS is a solution of monatomic minerals in their high-spin state. But over time direct contact to light can put them back into their regular-spin state. Miron glass maintains the integrety of the ORMUS over extended periods of time!

                                                               BEFORE  

                                         

                                                               

                                                                  AFTER    

                 

  • Price: $6K

PHASE 2: Sampling & product demonstrations. Once we have passed phase 1 we can begin phase 2 which includes sampling and product demonstrations at farmers markets! In phase 2 we will use the money received to purchase half ounce, disposable sample packs for ORMUS. This will help us bring the ORMUS to you and share it with the world.

  • Price: $4.5K

PHASE 3: Lab testing. In phase 3 we will use all of the money received to get our ORMUS tested in the laboratory so that we can put the exact concentration of elements and minerals on the label! We have also made arrangements with the Cleveland Clinic, one of the top clinics in the world, for testing our ORMUS on dermatology patients in a double blind clinic study! Double blind means that there will be a control group and an experimental group in this study. The control group will receive the ORMUS and the experimental group will receive a placebo so that we can be 100% sure that the healing benefits received from the ormus are completely proven and legitimate. This study will be documented in ORMUS history by the head of dermatology at the Cleveland clinic! 

  • Price: $6.5K

PHASE 4: Branding & Marketing. Our final phase is about the overall package and educating materials for ORMUS. We need your help to put together a professional, attractive and educational website, trademarking our logo and company name, and build a very simple but very educational documentary on the history or ORMUS, how it was discovered, and its incredible ability to relieve anxiety & stress, while simultaneously increasing alertness and focus.

  • Price: $4K


 WHO IS ORMUS FOR?

ORMUS is for everyone interested in living a rich, full, inspired, self-aware, balanced and happy lifestyle! 

*Actors - Star actor Jeremy Piven buying his first bottle of ORMUS! Jeremy gave us GREAT feedback! 

                              


*Athletes - Head trainers and Crossfit champions at BRICK Crossfit discovering the magic of ORMUS!

                              


*Employees - Whole Foods employee Tyler buying his first bottle of ORMUS! Soon, with your help, Whole Foods will have ORMUS too!

                              


*Doormen - Todd buying his fifth bottle of ORMUS to keep him fueled through his late night shifts! This photo was taken at Erewhon Natural Health Foods Market in Los Angeles. With your help the Erewhon Market will have ORMUS too!

                              

*Everyone - We had so much fun with an ORMUS bar at our event held in congress woman Marianne Williamson's honor(to my left). At the ORMUS bar we had Rose ORMUS, Blue Lotus ORMUS, and sugar free, all natural, delicious, healthy Smores ORMUS made with organic cinnamon bark extract, organic marshmallow root, and Organic Cacao powder. Everyone felt amazing!         

                               
                               

                               

                               


WHEN IS THE BEST TIME TO TAKE ORMUS?

ORMUS is great for important meetings, meditations, dates or hangouts with friends and family, exercise, yoga, work, exams, or anything that involves focus, alertness, and energy! 


WHERE DOES ORMUS COME FROM? 

There are trace amounts of ORMUS in raw living things, such as vegetables. But these things have such a small amount that they can not be considered a reliable source. ORMUS is also found in volcanic ash, sea water, naturally occurring spring waters, and the soils surrounding them. However, before enough ORMUS can be collected to be used as a dietary supplement it needs to be concentrated from these sources. 

*It takes 12 gallons of ocean water just to collect 1 tablespoon of pure ORMUS!


HOW DO WE MAKE ORMUS?  

Step 1: We combine pure Dead Sea salt with naturally occurring spring water. 

  • The Dead Sea is the most well known source for something called activated silica, which is what contains the ORMUS. This makes the Dead Sea the best source for collecting pure ORMUS. It takes 30 gallons of Dead Sea salt water to collect just 1 liter of pure ORMUS!

Step 2: We increase the pH naturally using what in alchemy is known as "The wet method". 

  • By increasing the pH in an all natural way using a food grade compound of hydrogen and oxygen, we separate the ORMUS from the activated silica in the Dead Sea salt water solution. The ORMUS naturally settles at the bottom of the water, allowing us to concentrate it.

Step 3: We remove the left over sodium and water. 

  • By washing ultra-filtered water through the ORMUS we are able to remove any sodium that is left over from the Dead Sea salt water. This purifies the ORMUS, concentrating it even further. This process is extremely important and takes an entire month!


A LITTLE ABOUT PRESCOTT LOVE:

I grew up in Rochester, New York. At 18 I joined the Air Force because I wanted to take part in protecting our nation and those nations that we can help. I then Attended the University of Arizona where I studied Chemistry and Psychology, graduating with a Bachelor of Science. Initially I wanted to be a Psychiatrist, I really just wanted to help bring balance into people's lives and thought prescription drugs were the best way to do it, but I had gained information by my senior year of college that made me no longer comfortable prescribing prescription drugs on such a large scale. I started to understand that for the majority of people a more natural and holistic approach would not only be more beneficial, but also safer. I switched my focus to therapy and began counseling at a residential treatment center for adults with addictions and eating disorders, and had been studying natural ways of medicinal therapy such as Ayurveda, and Chinese medicine. I was finding that so many things that grow naturally contain exactly what people need to help them find the balance and harmony they were seeking in a healthy, non-dependance inducing way. 


ABOUT ORMUS:

During this time I came across something known as ORMUS. I found that millions of dollars had gone into studying ORMUS and that it's list of benefits are virtually endless. Some of these benefits include: 

  1. Balancing the left and right hemispheres of the brain
  2. Increasing brain capacity
  3. Repairing DNA
  4. Third eye opening
If you think about just these four benefits, you see that ORMUS can help with so many disorders, like ADD & ADHD, depression, anxiety, addictions, OCD, PTSD, eating disorders, and more. ORMUS can help with any disorder that involves an unbalance in one's thinking and ways of behavior.  ORMUS can also help with skin and hair growth and repair, which I have seen personally. It also increases brain activity, helping to alleviate blindsides in our own consciousness. You might say it helps to wake us up. I started having colorful, lucid dreams after just a couple of weeks using it. I also started to see my actions an non-actions so much more clearly, as well as where my actions/hesitations were coming from. This allowed me to have an even greater ability to shape my own character. Anybody with a desire to live fully will benefit from this. In this way, it helps people create the higher version of themselves, helps with manifesting, and connecting with our own inner truths as well as with the people around us. It is like taking the subconscious and moving it into consciousness. It shows us how much power we really have over our own thought, which we start to see, is our power. This can help people in the clinical psychology setting by showing them how much power over their own reality they actually have, because our subconscious plays a huge role in the world that has shaped around us. ORMUS helps to show people that we live in the present, not in the past. When we start to understand this we see that we can move on from tough or traumatic experiences without allowing them to continually haunt us. And if we don't have tough or traumatic experiences to move on from, imagine the leap forward that a healthy happy individual can take with this new heightened awareness. ORMUS helps us manifest an even greater, more positive lifestyle than we are already living. It can bring us even closer to enjoying the moment, and give us an even greater understanding of happiness and fulfillment. Which is why it is not necessary one use ORMUS for the rest of their life, once we have a deep understanding of this fulfillment, it does not leave us, but only momentarily, and the greater our understanding is the shorter and more far between these moments are. I have experienced all of these benefits myself, and that is why I am so passionate about sharing this with the world. My hearing was degenerated from my time in the Air Force, and after a couple of months with ORMUS I suddenly realized that my hearing had gotten a lot better. I gave the ormus to my mother and she told me she could see more clearly without her glasses on. She has been using glasses since I was born. And no, the ormus has not given her 20x20 vision, but it had definitely helped. ORMUS also helps with deep, restful sleep. Just after a week of using ormus I started to get very colorful lucid dreams. This is because ORMUS helps to decalcify the Pineal gland. The Pineal gland is one of the most important parts of our body, but also one of the least understood by the general public. It is responsible for DMT, melatonin, and serotonin production and regulation. This is HUGE because DMT is responsible for our dream state, which is not only active while we are asleep it is also active while we are awake and largely responsible for our ability to manifest, because before we can manifest anything, we have to see it clearly in our mind. Serotonin is responsible for mood patterns and melatonin is responsible for sleep patterns. All of these also work together to create energy and deep rest. So as you can imagine, having a healthy and fully functional Pineal gland is pinnacle to living a healthy, happy, balanced life. But chemicals and "junk", such as processed foods, cause a calcification of material around the pineal gland which renders it less functional in our bodies. This is making people less aware, in a sense one could say that calcification of the Pineal gland dumbs us down. Fluoride is extremely detrimental to the Pineal gland because of how it forms a crust around it, reducing its ability to make and excrete DMT, serotonin, and melatonin. But doctors don't tell us this, they just give us prescription drugs. Fluoride is found abundantly in tap water, and even bottled water. Brita filters do not remove Fluoride. In fact, it is only the activated alumina filters that remove Fluoride, which is the type of filter I use when making ORMUS. Sure reverse osmosis filters remove Fluoride, but they also remove every mineral in the water, making the water highly reactive and causing it to demineralize our bones when we drink it. This is why I do not drink Reverse Osmosis water, but let's just stick to ORMUS for now. So, as we can see, the benefits of ORMUS are broad, encompassing almost everything a person could use help with. Some of my customers are A-list actors who have told me they find the ORMUS helps them tap into character right away rather than after 2 or 3 takes. I also have beauty pageant winners who have taken it before presenting themselves to the judges because of the way it brings them into the present moment, and allows them to open up to, and connect with others. I have also had very busy office workers tell me about how it has allowed them to remain calm and focused amongst and increasing flow of work load, helping them to be way more efficient in the office. For the most part, everybody who has used my ORMUS has noticed an amazing increase in synchronistic experiences and divine timing.  


WHY ARE WE DOING THIS?:

The goal of Prescott & Love Alchemy is to help people towards physical, psychological and spiritual excellence. We want to bring you balance and satisfaction with life in an all natural way that will not be dependance inducing and will last you the rest of your life. 

*Here's the problem...

We now have 1 in ever 4 women ages 50 to 64 found on antidepressants, 13% Americans are also on antidepressants, 17% are being prescribed antibiotics, and 13% are on painkilling opioids. That is nearly 70% of the population on prescription drugs! Psychiatric medication is up nearly 400% in the last ten years!!!  This is not the way towards balance and happiness, but the problem is that pharmaceutical companies aren't concerned with our happiness, they are concerned with the well-being of their MASSIVE corporation! They have thousands of employees to pay and billions just to cover in bills... Which means they need customers... And unfortunately, their customers are YOU! Did you know that pharmaceutical companies are funding healthcare and paying the hospitals? This is really, really bad for us. This means that it is the pharmaceutical companies actually PAYING hospitals to keep people on their prescription drugs! The statistics I mentioned early are not decreasing, they are increasing. And with the current scheme continuing nearly 90% of all Americans will be put on harmful prescription drugs in the next 10 years, and many of these drugs are not only dependance inducing, but will also drain the body so much that they will only weaken the immune system causing us to keep coming back to the pharmaceutical companies for more drugs. Are you aware that the percentage of children between the age of 6-12 are placed on prescription drugs for a disorder that has been invented by the pharmaceutical companies known as ADD & ADHD? At age 6 I was one of those children... I no longer use prescription medication and spent years fighting dependance it had given me as a child! Currently 5.1% of children in America between the age of 6-12 are put on Ritalin or Adderall for ADD & ADHD. Ritalin and Adderall are virtually the same thing, they just have different names, the pharmaceutical companies do this with nearly all of their drugs to keep the public interested and to keep sales high. Here is the scary thing about putting these young children on Ritalin and Adderall, these drugs have the same active compound as METHAMPHETAMINE! These drugs were invented by the Japense millitary in World War II for use in their fighter pilots. Their pilots would not sleep for days on these drugs and continued to reload their plains with ammunition and go right back up to blowing people out of the sky... Now the Government is allowing these drugs to be prescribed to children who are naturally "hyper-active", with the claim that it effects them in the "opposite" way it would effect a "normal" child. This is very sad, and very dangerous. The pharmaceutical companies having such power over health care are the cause of hundreds of disorders being invented just so hospitals can put people on their drugs. 

Prescott & Love Alchemy says "NO". We say it is not drugs that you need, but balance. Drugs will only knock a person even further out of balance, but ORMUS brings us deeper into balance. Prescott & Love Alchemy wants to put the word out, and to truly heal people, for true longevity and vitality; for true, permanent happiness and health. To remind people who have lost that sense of their inner self what it feels like to be truly whole, and happy again, as they once were. Not just keep them coming back like is seen with pharmaceutical companies. 

HOW YOU CAN HELP US!

Currently there are many tonic bars, juice bars, spas and health food markets, such as Wholefoods and Erewhon who want to start providing people with our ormus. But we do not have the funds to match this demand. We need your help. Please donate and help us share the gift of balance and heightened consciousness. Please help us educate the public on ORMUS and natural ways to achieve and maintain balance for true happiness and longevity. And please share our campaign with as many people as possible! ORMUS can help people with depression, anxiety, ADD & ADHD, and so many other "disorders" that the pharmaceutical companies have invented! It can help rebalance the left and right brain hemispheres. I can help anyone who has a demanding job or lifestyle step up their game! We need to put the word out, and we need your support. 


With love and gratitude,
Prescott Love

WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT!*Millions of dollars have gone into researching this long kept secret*Proven to reduce stress & anxiety*Proven to increase focus & awareness*Naturally balances mood and sleep patterns*Absolutely NO crash *Repairs your skin, hair, nails, and even helps with hearing eye sight *Helps to bring colorful and lucid dreams*Safe and effective with NO side effects *Can be used everyday as often as you like  Help us bring ORMUS to you!We need $21,000 USD to get the secret of ORMUS out into the public and over to you. ORMUS has helped a ton of people who not only come back for more, but end up buying bottles for friends and family. But currently it is only sold through our website, and we need your support to get ORMUS into the public and out to you! Here is the first three phases where the money will go...PHASE 1: Packaging. This includes miron glass bottles and professionally designed labels. Why Miron glass? ORMUS is a special product, there is no other product like it. And it needs to be protected. Miron glass is the only glass in the world that blocks the entire spectrum of light frequency. This protection is so important because the ORMUS is a solution of monatomic minerals in their high-spin state. But over time direct contact to light can put them back into their regular-spin state. Miron glass maintains the integrety of the ORMUS over extended periods of time!                                                               BEFORE                                                                                                                                                                            AFTER                     
Price: $6KPHASE 2: Sampling & product demonstrations. Once we have passed phase 1 we can begin phase 2 which includes sampling and product demonstrations at farmers markets! In phase 2 we will use the money received to purchase half ounce, disposable sample packs for ORMUS. This will help us bring the ORMUS to you and share it with the world.
Price: $4.5KPHASE 3: Lab testing. In phase 3 we will use all of the money received to get our ORMUS tested in the laboratory so that we can put the exact concentration of elements and minerals on the label! We have also made arrangements with the Cleveland Clinic, one of the top clinics in the world, for testing our ORMUS on dermatology patients in a double blind clinic study! Double blind means that there will be a control group and an experimental group in this study. The control group will receive the ORMUS and the experimental group will receive a placebo so that we can be 100% sure that the healing benefits received from the ormus are completely proven and legitimate. This study will be documented in ORMUS history by the head of dermatology at the Cleveland clinic! Price: $6.5KPHASE 4: Branding & Marketing. Our final phase is about the overall package and educating materials for ORMUS. We need your help to put together a professional, attractive and educational website, trademarking our logo and company name, and build a very simple but very educational documentary on the history or ORMUS, how it was discovered, and its incredible ability to relieve anxiety & stress, while simultaneously increasing alertness and focus.Price: $4K WHO IS ORMUS FOR?ORMUS is for everyone interested in living a rich, full, inspired, self-aware, balanced and happy lifestyle! *Actors - Star actor Jeremy Piven buying his first bottle of ORMUS! Jeremy gave us GREAT feedback!                               *Athletes - Head trainers and Crossfit champions at BRICK Crossfit discovering the magic of ORMUS!                              *Employees - Whole Foods employee Tyler buying his first bottle of ORMUS! Soon, with your help, Whole Foods will have ORMUS too!                              *Doormen - Todd buying his fifth bottle of ORMUS to keep him fueled through his late night shifts! This photo was taken at Erewhon Natural Health Foods Market in Los Angeles. With your help the Erewhon Market will have ORMUS too!                              *Everyone - We had so much fun with an ORMUS bar at our event held in congress woman Marianne Williamson's honor(to my left). At the ORMUS bar we had Rose ORMUS, Blue Lotus ORMUS, and sugar free, all natural, delicious, healthy Smores ORMUS made with organic cinnamon bark extract, organic marshmallow root, and Organic Cacao powder. Everyone felt amazing!                                                                                                                                     WHEN IS THE BEST TIME TO TAKE ORMUS?ORMUS is great for important meetings, meditations, dates or hangouts with friends and family, exercise, yoga, work, exams, or anything that involves focus, alertness, and energy! WHERE DOES ORMUS COME FROM? There are trace amounts of ORMUS in raw living things, such as vegetables. But these things have such a small amount that they can not be considered a reliable source. ORMUS is also found in volcanic ash, sea water, naturally occurring spring waters, and the soils surrounding them. However, before enough ORMUS can be collected to be used as a dietary supplement it needs to be concentrated from these sources. *It takes 12 gallons of ocean water just to collect 1 tablespoon of pure ORMUS!HOW DO WE MAKE ORMUS?  Step 1: We combine pure Dead Sea salt with naturally occurring spring water. The Dead Sea is the most well known source for something called activated silica, which is what contains the ORMUS. This makes the Dead Sea the best source for collecting pure ORMUS. It takes 30 gallons of Dead Sea salt water to collect just 1 liter of pure ORMUS!
Step 2: We increase the pH naturally using what in alchemy is known as "The wet method". By increasing the pH in an all natural way using a food grade compound of hydrogen and oxygen, we separate the ORMUS from the activated silica in the Dead Sea salt water solution. The ORMUS naturally settles at the bottom of the water, allowing us to concentrate it.
Step 3: We remove the left over sodium and water. By washing ultra-filtered water through the ORMUS we are able to remove any sodium that is left over from the Dead Sea salt water. This purifies the ORMUS, concentrating it even further. This process is extremely important and takes an entire month!A LITTLE ABOUT PRESCOTT LOVE:I grew up in Rochester, New York. At 18 I joined the Air Force because I wanted to take part in protecting our nation and those nations that we can help. I then Attended the University of Arizona where I studied Chemistry and Psychology, graduating with a Bachelor of Science. Initially I wanted to be a Psychiatrist, I really just wanted to help bring balance into people's lives and thought prescription drugs were the best way to do it, but I had gained information by my senior year of college that made me no longer comfortable prescribing prescription drugs on such a large scale. I started to understand that for the majority of people a more natural and holistic approach would not only be more beneficial, but also safer. I switched my focus to therapy and began counseling at a residential treatment center for adults with addictions and eating disorders, and had been studying natural ways of medicinal therapy such as Ayurveda, and Chinese medicine. I was finding that so many things that grow naturally contain exactly what people need to help them find the balance and harmony they were seeking in a healthy, non-dependance inducing way. ABOUT ORMUS:During this time I came across something known as ORMUS. I found that millions of dollars had gone into studying ORMUS and that it's list of benefits are virtually endless. Some of these benefits include: 
Balancing the left and right hemispheres of the brain
Increasing brain capacity
Repairing DNA
Third eye opening
If you think about just these four benefits, you see that ORMUS can help with so many disorders, like ADD & ADHD, depression, anxiety, addictions, OCD, PTSD, eating disorders, and more. ORMUS can help with any disorder that involves an unbalance in one's thinking and ways of behavior.  ORMUS can also help with skin and hair growth and repair, which I have seen personally. It also increases brain activity, helping to alleviate blindsides in our own consciousness. You might say it helps to wake us up. I started having colorful, lucid dreams after just a couple of weeks using it. I also started to see my actions an non-actions so much more clearly, as well as where my actions/hesitations were coming from. This allowed me to have an even greater ability to shape my own character. Anybody with a desire to live fully will benefit from this. In this way, it helps people create the higher version of themselves, helps with manifesting, and connecting with our own inner truths as well as with the people around us. It is like taking the subconscious and moving it into consciousness. It shows us how much power we really have over our own thought, which we start to see, is our power. This can help people in the clinical psychology setting by showing them how much power over their own reality they actually have, because our subconscious plays a huge role in the world that has shaped around us. ORMUS helps to show people that we live in the present, not in the past. When we start to understand this we see that we can move on from tough or traumatic experiences without allowing them to continually haunt us. And if we don't have tough or traumatic experiences to move on from, imagine the leap forward that a healthy happy individual can take with this new heightened awareness. ORMUS helps us manifest an even greater, more positive lifestyle than we are already living. It can bring us even closer to enjoying the moment, and give us an even greater understanding of happiness and fulfillment. Which is why it is not necessary one use ORMUS for the rest of their life, once we have a deep understanding of this fulfillment, it does not leave us, but only momentarily, and the greater our understanding is the shorter and more far between these moments are. I have experienced all of these benefits myself, and that is why I am so passionate about sharing this with the world. My hearing was degenerated from my time in the Air Force, and after a couple of months with ORMUS I suddenly realized that my hearing had gotten a lot better. I gave the ormus to my mother and she told me she could see more clearly without her glasses on. She has been using glasses since I was born. And no, the ormus has not given her 20x20 vision, but it had definitely helped. ORMUS also helps with deep, restful sleep. This is HUGE because DMT is responsible for our dream state, which is not only active while we are asleep it is also active while we are awake and largely responsible for our ability to manifest, because before we can manifest anything, we have to see it clearly in our mind. Serotonin is responsible for mood patterns and melatonin is responsible for sleep patterns. All of these also work together to create energy and deep rest. But chemicals and "junk", such as processed foods, cause a calcification of material around the pineal gland which renders it less functional in our bodies. story:
Hello my name is Wale, I am 11 years old and I am a 5th Grader at the Montclair Elementary School in Virginia. My one true passion in life is tennis. I started playing the game when I was 8 years old with my mom and her friend. It was the first time we ever held rackets and it was exciting! This casual encounter started my passion for tennis. Early last year, I started taking lessons at the Montclair Tennis Club. My mom has been very supportive of my desire to play tennis, and perhaps even as a professional someday, but she has limited means as a single mom. The tennis club has also been very supportive – they have been kind enough to subsidize my lessons. My education is also very important to me. My mom’s only condition for her support has been that I keep up my good grades or stop playing tennis. I have managed to maintain Honor Roll grades and I have been competitively selected for a Middle School International Baccalaureate program.

I am writing to you today to ask for your support because I still have so much to learn about the game. I won my first club tournament game a few weeks ago. Even though I played well and my coach was very impressed by my points, I feel that I have to be better prepared for tougher opponents. This summer, I would like to go to the Evert Tennis Academy in Florida for a 4-week intensive training and sports conditioning summer program. I did my research and my mom called and spoke to the Director of the camp. The total cost of the trip will be $7,500 including travel expenses. My mom will contribute $500 and pay her airfare to take me there.

I work really hard on my tennis and I devote most of my spare time to this sport that I love. In addition to tennis, I am a Church volunteer at the Hilda Barg Homeless Shelter in Woodbridge Virginia and I also volunteer at the food pantry for ACTS (Action in Community Through Service). You will make me the happiest 11-year old in the world if you support me – no amount is too small. I promise not to disappoint you all and I promise to work even harder at school and at tennis. If I raise more than $7,000, I will donate all extra funds to the Hilda Barg Homeless Shelter and will continue to give my time to the shelter and other volunteer opportunities. Thank you for investing in my future.
