story:
We are CREATING new SMILES!!!

Hey folks ... WE ARE SUPER EXCITED to run this campaign!!! 

We are celebrating tremendous success and want to build on the momentum. Over the past few months we located several people young and old alike who were born with craniofacial deformities in rural and poverty stricken villages of India and provided them with FREE surgeries and holistic care. Now we have the opportunity to do more ... LOTS MORE ... A WHOLE LOT MORE!!!

In the month of February alone, we will be in South India (Karnataka) doing 4 medical camps to help several more folks born with cleft lip, cleft palate, and other facial deformities. Through the year we expect to do at least 250 surgeries and we need to raise $150,000 to help get this project completed successfully. The more we raise the more people we can help. Would you join us?

The video above is a feature about Philip Mathews who was born with a condition called as Goldenhar Syndrome. He has overcome all odds to be where he is today. He is our hero and the inspiration for the birth of  Love Without Reason. Read all about Philip and his story at http://lovewithoutreason.org/index.php/philips-testimony/ Philip has inspired us to reach out and find children like him and give them HOPE. Would you contribute to this cause and give HOPE to those who are hurting? Join with us and celebrate our successes with each surgery!
Gopika, a baby with a cleft lip. LWR was able to perform her surgery in November 2012.

There are many more "CURSED and TORTURED" children like Gopika (left) who would have lived a life of rejection and isolation like Swamy (below) if LWR would not have intervened. We found Gopika as a newborn and helped repair her lip. She is now an even more beautiful baby with an amazing smile. Click here to see her updated picture

Swamy (pictured below) is a 21 year old man who needed a cleft palate surgery. A man that lived a life of rejection and sorrow because of his deformity. His eyes reflect the haunting reality of a person born with craniofacial deformities. When we met Swamy, he refused to look at us because he felt ashamed and had an extremely low self-esteem. Swamy cannot make himself heard because of his open palate. Click here to see his open palate

WHAT IS THE DEAL???

Let me explain! All over the world, children are born with severe craniofacial deformities--deformities of the bones in the skull or face. In fact, as many as one in 700 births result in cleft lip and/or palate. In India alone there are 35,000 babies born with a cleft each year. Most are born in poor rural villages. These folks cannot afford the cost of surgeries and hence live a life of misery - where others consider them cursed. 

Many of these children suffer complex health issues in addition to facing social rejection, neglect, and physical or emotional abuse; some are even killed upon birth. Most have no hope for a better future.		 Swamy, a 21 year old with cleft palate. LWR was able to perform his surgery in November 2012. Swamy wants to get married, but could not find anyone because of his deformity. We pray that he is able to find his life partner soon

What we are doing the month of February?

Our founder, Santhosh Mathews, will be going to India from Feb 5th to Feb 25th and will be posting weekly updates on the 4 medical camps. This is the plan

  • Week 1: An update from Kamathipura, the redlight district of Mumbai, India. LWR joins with other organizations to fight sex trafficking. Of the 200,000 sex slaves in this one city, many are minor children. Pray for the rescue and restoration of the victims!
  • Weeks 2-4: Updates from Karnataka to give you highlights of the patients and some details about the first and second medical camps held in rural villages.

Can we count on you to SUPER CHARGE this campaign?

JUMP! Jump on this incredible opportunity to join the army of SMILE CREATORS. A grassroots group of volunteers who have one goal ... Help Create Smiles! Your donations will go a long way in helping change the lives of many patients in this area. We are looking to raise 15,000 in one month. If we are able to raise more, then we can help more. Can you join us? Can you spread the word? Get the momentum rolling?

Go ahead call your friends ... call your neighbors, send out emails, send out invites ... Let us make some NOISE!!! 

"Go tell it on the mountain ... on the rooftops." This is an urgent call to action. Let us join hand-in-hand and get this ball rolling.

What do you get in return?

A BIG HUGE HUG from our Smile Creator army!!! ;-) OK just kidding ...

We are offering some amazing perks ... Take a look at the right of this column.

Don’t want to use a credit card? Mail a check made payable to Love Without Reason. Memo line: INDIEGOGO Campaign, Craniofacial Surgeries, to this address: P.O. Box 21009, Chattanooga TN 37424. You'll receive a receipt for your tax deduction. Please ensure that you note Indiegogo campaign to receive your perks.

So what do we do with YOUR money?

Love Without Reason has several partners in various parts of India. All donations given to LWR will be used for program expenses only. We do not have any salaried employees, and no salaries are paid out of this amount. We guarantee that every single penny will go toward helping folks.

 

The money will be used to fund the following

  • Cleft lip surgeries (average cost $400-$500)
  • Cleft palate surgeries (average cost $500-$600)
  • Anklyosis (TMJ) Cases where the patients have never opened their mouth - (average cost $1,000)
  • Medical camps (average cost $1,000)
  • Speech Therapy (average cost $200 per year)
  • Education for our patients (average cost per year $150)
  • Family transportation/lodging (average cost $150 per surgery depeding on distance travelled and no of nights stay)
  • Volunteer expenses (international and local travel/lodging)

Sanjay, 6 month old male needing cleft lip surgery. His parents are daily wage earners (minimum wage) and cannot dream of affording a surgery for him. Our team met Sanjay in October 2012. The parents continued to call every 10 days in hope of a surgery for Sanjay. LWR has decided to use a new treatment method using a product called DynaCleft to help improve the surgery results. Please keep this in your prayers.

Other Ways You Can Help

Get involved ... get the word out!!! We need to get as many folks to MAKE SOME NOISE about this campaign. Use the Indiegogo share tools!

  • Like us on Facebook... Click the like button
  • Tweet about us on Twitter ... Click the "bird"
  • Use the EMBED button to include the campaign details in your emails, blogs, facebook page etc...
  • Finally "CLICK the HEART" -- Make us your favorite campaign and follow us as we give you the inside scoop about new perks!!!

We are looking for long-term Partners

This is an awesome cause and we need long-term partners who would commit to our cause. Email us at info@lovewithoutreason.org to become our partners.

Each of you have a part to play! The Smile Creators campaign is a national initiative to raise awareness as well as funding for children requiring complex craniofacial surgeries (facial deformities).

Combating Sex Trafficking

Love Without Reason is also involved in fighting sex trafficking around the world by raising awareness. Victims of sex trafficking endure rape and other forms of sexual abuse from multiple clients. They may be forced to participate in pornographic films, or be sold as sex slaves in a bidding process. To ensure compliance, traffickers may torture, drug, and threaten victims until they obey. At Love Without Reason, we are passionate about the long-term restoration of victims after they are rescued. We know that lives can be ‘refashioned’ to form new vessels by The Potter. Because sex trafficking is a worldwide problem, LWR is working to raise awareness and shelters that will holistically treat and rehabilitate these individuals throughout the world.
 Join us... CREATE new SMILES

story:
HELLO to all you musicians, music lovers, entrepreneurs, tech geeks, and lovely people willing to help us create the BEST music software ever known to man!

The Problem:

There is no shortage of what we call "technical nonsense" available to musicians and composers...both pro and amateur.

But the problem is that most, if not every single one, is severely limiting in its function, confusing, and downright annoying to use!

Let's face it...you want to CREATE...not take weeks (or LONGER) to learn how to use something that is just a "tool". And you shouldn't have to wait...the world needs that new top-charting song that we know is rolling around your noggin'! So, please keep reading about our plan to turn the music writing world on its head!

The Solution:

So, our design is simple, really. Create a software that allows for fully-customized creativity with literally a one-minute learning curve. Whether a songwriter wants a simple lyric sheet with a few chords laid out...or someone wants to pen the world's newest and "bestest" classical style Opus...they can do it all from one place...with as much or as little detail as they want! Cool, right?

Oh, and did we mention that there is NOTHING on the market like this! Nada...zip...

So, this will be the first web-based application that will get out of the way of creativity...and let the music makers make music...all while being intuitive to the song building process!

Exciting, right?

Who This Is For:

  • Beginning songwriters
  • Professional songwriters
  • Composers
  • Lyricists
  • Musical "hobbyists"
  • Music teachers - This will change your life! Customize lessons for students in seconds.
  • Poets looking for a new medium
  • Anyone who plays ANY instrument...and needs a super-simple, but robust application to get their music out to the world!

Check Out These Amazing Features:

  • Trailblazing new technologies - Sorry to be vague here...but we don't want any imposters stealing our ideas!
  • "Play Before You Pay" - This feature will let anyone try the application to see if it is for them before jumping on board. We are putting this feature in because it is for EVERYONE interested in writing music!
  • Community Building - Our application will have a "collaboration room" where like-minded music lovers can co-create, lend a hand, or form new musical groups!
  • Monthly Songwriting contests where winners can win cash or other prizes...leading up to a yearly "Best Of" song-off!
  • Lots of other features that will allow members to protect and "showcase" their music to the WORLD! 

What Is Funding For:

As you can imagine...having an application built in the finest new technologies carries a hefty price. On top of this will be servers, administrative costs, and advertising (gotta let the world know this exists!). Rest assured we are asking for this funding humbly...and each and every penny will go toward making this application easy to use, fully-featured, and available to everyone in the world!
 
Our team has the experience and know how to get this done! We have Jon Belt (marketing guru) and Todd Gibson (coding ninja)...the plans are finalized...we just need a boost!
 
About Jon:
 
My name is Jon Belt and I am from Saint Louis, MO. I have played guitar and written songs for close to 20 years. I play for enjoyment...but do not make a living from it. However, I know a LOT of people do...and that sparked this idea...real musicians. It would be a true honor to help them stay in the creative flow...and make their lives easier! I am also an entrepreneur with a marketing background...so I know I can get this in front of people once we are live!
 
About Todd: 
 
Howdy! I'm Todd Gibson.  I live in Southwestern Michigan with my wife and kids.  I have been creating software since I was 13 years old (I'm now 35, sheesh!).  I've done it professionally for over 10 years.  When Jon brought this challenge to my attention, I was excited from the get go.  I've dabbled in music for years and this was an idea that really lit a fire!  I'm humbled to be a partner with Jon and I know we can make something really great for all of you to enjoy.
 
Final Note:
 
Please take a look to your right at some of the goodies we have for those of you who want to help jump-start this product. I know once given a chance this product can and WILL change lives! 
 
We do ask...even if you do not help with funding...we would be forever grateful if you would post this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, or the social media outlet of your choice! The more people on board...the better the product and the faster we can get it out there!
 
We will be on here with regular updates...and please don't be a stranger...find us on Facebook, etc...
 
Thank you so much for taking time out of your day to spend some time with us...we will never forget you:-)
 
-Jon & Todd

Lots of other features that will allow members to protect and "showcase" their music to the WORLD! 


What Is Funding For:
As you can imagine...having an application built in the finest new technologies carries a hefty price. On top of this will be servers, administrative costs, and advertising (gotta let the world know this exists!). Rest assured we are asking for this funding humbly...and each and every penny will go toward making this application easy to use, fully-featured, and available to everyone in the world!
 
Our team has the experience and know how to get this done! We have Jon Belt (marketing guru) and Todd Gibson (coding ninja)...the plans are finalized...we just need a boost!
 
About Jon:
 
My name is Jon Belt and I am from Saint Louis, MO. I have played guitar and written songs for close to 20 years. I play for enjoyment...but do not make a living from it. However, I know a LOT of people do...and that sparked this idea...real musicians. It would be a true honor to help them stay in the creative flow...and make their lives easier! I am also an entrepreneur with a marketing background...so I know I can get this in front of people once we are live!
 

About Todd: 
 
Howdy! I'm Todd Gibson.  I live in Southwestern Michigan with my wife and kids.  I have been creating software since I was 13 years old (I'm now 35, sheesh!).  I've done it professionally for over 10 years.  When Jon brought this challenge to my attention, I was excited from the get go.  I've dabbled in music for years and this was an idea that really lit a fire!  I'm humbled to be a partner with Jon and I know we can make something really great for all of you to enjoy.
 
Final Note:
 
Please take a look to your right at some of the goodies we have for those of you who want to help jump-start this product. I know once given a chance this product can and WILL change lives! 
 
We do ask...even if you do not help with funding...we would be forever grateful if you would post this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, or the social media outlet of your choice! The more people on board...the better the product and the faster we can get it out there!
 
We will be on here with regular updates...and please don't be a stranger...find us on Facebook, etc...
 
Thank you so much for taking time out of your day to spend some time with us...we will never forget you:-)
 
-Jon & Todd

story:
Allow me to first introduce myself. My name is James, and I’m a graduating student in Health Science at SFU. The day after my last exam, I’ll be getting on my bicycle and heading to Tijuana, Mexico in hopes of raising $5,200 to support a novel solution to a very real problem in Namibia, access to healthcare. While there has been much recent development of healthcare facilities in Namibia and other African countries, they remain inaccessible to many of those who need them. This is a problem particularly to expectant mothers, who often cannot afford to pay for a ride to the nearest hospital for delivery or prenatal care, and end up walling upwards of 40km or not going to the hospital at all, which is a major contributor to the 350,000 maternal deaths that occur annually.

The solution that BEN Namibia, and other similar organizations, are using is the bicycle ambulance. For around $500, a bicycle ambulance can provide 5 years of trips to the hospital for mothers, those suffering with infectious diseases such as HIV and malaria, and trauma patients, saving countless lives.

100% of funds riased from my ride and this campaign will be directied to procurement and implimentation of these bike ambulances. I will be covering all trip costs myself. This is a unique opportunity to support a cause like this in that  it is a tested and reliable intervention, and will have an immediate and measurable impact. 

Please get in touch if you have any questions about this project. Information about the trip can be found at jctomexico.tumblr.com, and I can be reached by email at jcbiketomexico@gmail.com

story:
This wounded coyote needs your help to nurse it back to health so that it may join the others in their natural habitat of road courses across the US!

 

Note: this campaign was originally opened by fellow enthusiast Chris Neumann, its been moved to ease the administration and donation of funds. Thanks! -CW

 

The situation:

CaptDistraction was denied warranty from Ford for a new replacement motor after a trip in the desert where the engine let go (consuming a valve and a seperate piston cracking through). Instead of CaptDistraction selling all of his personal belongings or spending a long time without his primary transportation,  We're hoping to raise enough money for him to get his motor replaced from Ford and get back on his feet. 

For more detail: http://bit.ly/L8nsHo

 

Why help?

25% of the received funds will be donated to the ARC (see below for more detail). The remaining funds up to the project total cost will go towards repairing this 2011 Mustang GT. Additionally Any overage will go 100% to charity donation to the ARC. What an enthusiast will get back from their donation outside the charitable contribution is the continued development and exposure of this car through youtube videos, how-to videos, product testing and development; Providing the community with insight, entertainment, and help wherever possible.

 

Because Racecar.

 

About Chris Wynne (CaptDistraction)

Chris Wynne is your average American hard working auto enthusiast. Based in Phoenix, Arizona, he works as an IT professional working in a small business that supports the greater Phoenix metro area. When not working, he is pursuing one of his many racing efforts be it karting, NASA, ProAutoSports, FRRG, or the 24 Hours of Lemons which he campaigns with fellow Audi enthusiasts. He also can be found helping and supporting other enthusiasts or providing photography support for many local and national race series.

Some links to his exploits:

http://www.youtube.com/captdistraction

http://www.audistyleracing.com

 

About the Arc (http://www.thearc.org)

We are the largest national community-based organization advocating for and serving people with intellectual and developmental disabilities and their families.  We encompass all ages and all spectrums from autism, Down syndrome, Fragile X and various other developmental disabilities.

The Arc was born 60 years ago from a grassroots movement of families working vigilantly to create services for children and adults who were being denied day care, educational opportunities and work programs.

Founded in 1950, The Arc was comprised of a small group of concerned and passionate parents and community members who would be catalyst for changing the public perception of children with disabilities.  For the past 60 years, The Arc has continued to grow and evolve along with the changing needs and issues people with disabilities and their families face.

The Arc is supported by and tied to motorsports. Don Istook of the Pirelli World Challenge supports the Arc in campaigning his Audi TTRS in events around the United States.

story:
Greetings!  Joe Goins here. 

 
Susy and I have been together since 1985.  We were wedded on March 21, 1987, and have three children: Joey, Christopher and Jacqulyn.
 
Susy's pain began in January, 2013 and worsened until March 6, 2013, when she was admitted to the hospital and had surgery to drain an abscess.
 
March 11, 2013, she was diagnosed with colon cancer.
 
March 13, 2013, she was diagnosed with breast cancer.
 
March 14, 2013, she had a colostomy.
 
Shortly after, Team Susy was started to support the treatment plan that will return Susy to cancer free wellness.
 
She is still in pain. She has been through radiation and chemotherapy.
 
On August 7, she will have surgery to remove the colon tumor and there is more chemotherapy in the future.
 
Implementing the treatment plan has required substantial financial resources.
 
The goal of this phase of the campaign is to raise $3,333 in 60 days.

All donations are gratefully appreciated and there are Perks.

Donations of $11 or more will receive an advance mp3 copy of "Jask Waltz", an original song from the Team Susy CD that has been playing during the video pitch.

The $33+ patron will receive the Team Susy CD, a music compact disc produced by Joe Goins and featuring the lovingly donated talents of Bill Pfleging, Rick Bowen, Mike Daily, Elizabeth Wills, Eugene Gwozdz, Andy Jeffries, Drew Ferraro, Charis Leos, Greg Deer, Joe Goins & others.

The Team Susy CD is currently in work and will ship in early December 2013.

Please join Team Susy with your donation and help us on our journey to return Susy to cancer free wellness.

Thank You!!

story:
Help secure sex education for 200 9th graders in Oakland Unified.

The median age for an unplanned pregnancy is 16.*

One unplanned pregnancy costs Californians about $23,175.*

Sex education costs $25 per student.**

Who’re we?

We're Shannon Farley from Spark and Deb Levine from ISIS. We work every day to secure health and education for women and girls.

How can I help?

5 things you can do to support this campaign.

1)    Make a donation. – Spark/ISIS is covering the administrative  costs of this effort. 100% of your donations will go directly to this project.

2)    Sign this petition. – Tell Oakland's School Board to enforce state law. 

3)    Learn More. – Read this comphrensive report on the status of sex education in Oakland Unified. 

4)    Spread the word.  – Share with your friends on Facebook and Twitter. Tell us your sex ed story and encourage others to share theirs.

5)   Participate in the pilot. - This is a pilot project. If you want to be part of it, email us at programs@sparksf.org.

--------

Since 2003, factually accurate, comprehensive sex education is state mandated. But all over California – even in the Bay Area – kids are not getting the education they need.

We know. We asked them.

We put an ad on Craigslist asking young women to tell us about their experience with sex education. That’s how we met Deja. Her story is like so many others in our state.

Even though sex education is mandatory in California public schools, most teenagers like Deja get too little, too late.


What are we going to do?

Our goal of $5,000 will bring sex education to 200 Oakland 9th graders this year. 

This is a pilot project. If we can make this work, we'll do it in your community next.

Why us?

Spark is the largest network of young philanthropists committed to women’s human rights in the world. ISIS is the national expert in using social and mobile media to improve young people’s access to reproductive health.

Why now?

We can’t afford to wait.

 

SOURCES:

*The National Campaign to Prevent Teen & Unplanned Pregnancy

**ISIS

story:
Utilize Health UPDATE:

Utilize Health is LIVE and ready for patient use!!! Click here or visit utilizehealth.co (not .com) to sign up today!! 



What is Utilize Health?

Utilize Health is a platform that matches patients with neurological disabilities to the therapies and facilities they need to maximize their potential for recovery. Think OpenTable or Hotels.com, but for patients and facilities/therapies. 

Our Story

Utilize Health Founder and Chief Executive Officer, Jessica Harthcock, was paralyzed at age 17 while practicing gymnastics. Doctors said she would never regain function. Jessica and her family spent several years traveling in search of highly specialized rehabilitation treatments. Through years of hard work and determination, Jessica learned to walk again. 

After experiencing difficulties finding resources and therapies, Jessica vowed to create a tool that could help other patients find the resources they needed without wasting time, energy and financial resources. Thus, Utilize Health was born.  

       


Milestones - 100 Patients 

Utilize Health recently matched more than 100 patients to therapies and facilities across the country. The Utilize Health team completed this process manually (essentially by looking at spreadsheets and other paper databases). Utilize Health currently has a backlog of patients and families waiting to be matched. Automating the matching process through our web application will allow Utilize Health to match thousands of patients! This is why we need YOUR help!! 

The funds you give will go directly to the development and creation of the web application. Additional funds are needed to operate the website and hire Patient Advocates for the first six months.   

Here's what some of the 100 patients and their families have said about Utilize Health since the process began:

“I had no clue these therapies existed. Thank you so much for my recommendations (matches)....For the first time in a long time, I am excited to see what the future holds for me.”

"I wanted to update you on my son's progress. Since Jeffrey started therapy at his new treatment center, he has progressed leaps and bounds. He STOOD for the first time all by himself...I am so thankful we found you."

"I had given up on recovery years ago, but you've inspired me to try again, and for that I will forever be grateful." 

Problem Utilize Health Solves 

Patients lack knowledge of potentially life changing treatments because some therapies are considered new, and they are not well publicized. Utilize Health solves this problem by creating smart matching technology that helps patients: 

  1. Learn about treatments 
  2. Locate facilities with those treatments 
  3. Engage with that facility by scheduling an appointment through the Utilize Health platform 

6 Conditions 

Utilize Health currently helps patients with 6 neurological conditions: stroke, spinal cord injury, traumatic brain injury, muscular dystrophy, cerebral palsy, and multiple sclerosis. These 6 different conditions encompass more than 

11 million people in the United States.

As Utilize Health grows, we hope to expand our services to other patient populations in the future.

_________________________________________________________________________

How Will the Funds be Used?

Our initial goal is $60K. The funds will be used for web application development. The biggest drivers behind the cost of the website are:

  • A proprietary algorithm, using several data sets to match patient conditions to therapy options and the qualified facilities, taking into account financial and geographic constraints.
  • A specialized user interface which is both ADA compliant and specifically designed for users with various neurological disabilities.
  • HIPAA compliance for security and privacy of personal health information.

All of these compound the complexity of the development and take what might appear on the surface as a less expensive app and make it more expensive to develop.

Our first stretch goal is $100K. We need the additional funds for maintenance and operational expenses (i.e., hiring Patient Advocates for the first 6 months). 

Web Development: We have contracted with a firm in Nashville, TN. They are ready to start building the web application and matching algorithms as soon as we give them the green light. Some of the funding will also be used towards hiring a User Experience (UX) Developer. As you can imagine, many Utilize Health users will have limited upper extremity mobility. We want to ensure an easy and seamless user experience for anyone who uses Utilize Health's website.

If we do not reach our entire goal, we will have to critically limit the scope of our web application. Certain features, like scheduling an appointment directly through the Utilize Health platform, may not be available. The more funds we raise, the more intuitive the web application will be. In addition, Utilize Health will be able to offer more features for our users. Below are some mocks ups of the website: (Note: This is subject to change based on the amount of funding we receive.) 

_________________________________________________________________________

How Does it Work?

Utilize Health is incredibly easy to use! After signing up, a user will be prompted to go through the following steps:

1. Create a User Profile: A user will be prompted to fill out a personal profile. You'll provide us with easy information like name, date of birth, and zip code. 

 

 2. Fill Out a Health Questionnaire: A user will be prompted to fill out a health questionnaire. You'll be asked questions about your injury/prognosis, date of onset, etc. You set the guidelines for us. Are you willing to travel? If so, how far? We will use all this information to best help you. The more information you provide us with, the better we can assist you in finding the best therapies and facilities for you!


3. Browse Your Matches: Based on the information you provided us, we match you with the best possible facilities and therapies. Click on each match to read about the types of therapies and treatments the facility offers.


4. Schedule a Visit: Choose the facility that you want to visit. Every facility is different. Every patient is different. After reading through your matches, you choose the facility that best suits your needs.


What is a Patient Advocate Subscription?

Utilize Health offers a baseline matching service FREE to all of its members. This is the core of what we do. We also understand that some patients need more than that. In addition to our free service, Utilize Health offers a paid upgrade subscription service for members. Think of this service as more of a concierge-like service for patients. 

Patient Advocates can assist patients with obtaining scripts from their physicians, providing additional research on a particular type of therapy, and/or discuss patient matches more in depth. 

Having a Patient Advocate Subscription allows a patient or family member to schedule a call anytime they want with one of Utilize Health's Patient Advocates. Our Patient Advocates will also send periodic emails to check in to make sure things are going well. 

_________________________________________________________________________

Perks and Prizes 


See below for a complete offering of all our prizes and perks. 

What is a Hatch Print? It's really cool...trust us. It's a poster that is designed and printed in a unique way. Go to www.hatchshowprint.com for more info. 

*Note: Prizes are subject to change in regards to font, color, and design used on all promotional items. The Hatch Print is on backorder. Estimated time of delivery is September 2014. 
_________________________________________________________________________

The Impact

11 million people in the United States have a physical disability due to a neurological condition such as a stroke or a spinal cord injury. The types of conditions that Utilize Health helps are life-altering. 

As you read above, Utilize Health has already matched more than 100 patients to therapies and facilities across the United States. Here's some more of what patients and their family members have said:

“You have given me something that no one has been able to give me - hope. After my son suffered a closed head traumatic brain injury, the doctors said he would remain in a vegetative state. My wife and I have been searching for treatment options since his accident. When we were referred to Utilize Health, our Patient Advocate helped us learn about what options were out there. Thank you and to all of the Utilize Health Team.”
"It's been 21 years since I have participated in PT and OT. I look forward to starting a new kind of physical therapy." 

When you back our Indiegogo campaign, the impact for patients with neurological conditions is life-changing. When patients are aware of what resources are available, they can make informed decisions about their healthcare. Utilize Health takes its philosophy a step further. Not only do we help patients learn about resources, we help patients and their families locate and engage with those facilities and therapies. 

_________________________________________________________________________

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute financially, there's several other meaningful ways you can help us:

  • Share Utilize Health's Indiegogo Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and other social media platforms. Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools at the bottom of this page :) It makes it quick and easy!
  • Email friends and family to request their support. We'll even give you a template to use. Just ask us, and we'll email it to you. 

Let's make some noise!! Together, we can help patients with neurological disabilities and their families find the resources that they need to maximize their potential for recovery. 

Join us, and together we can make a real difference in people's lives! 

_________________________________________________________________________

Meet the Founders


Utilize Health Founder and Chief Executive Officer, Jessica Harthcock, functions as a T3 paraplegic. As mentioned, Jessica was paralyzed at 17 and spent years traveling in search of highly specialized rehabilitation treatments that eventually helped her learn to walk again. Jessica has been connecting patients to facilities and therapies on her own for several years as a service to other patients. In May 2013, she decided to scale her efforts and create a technology-enabled service. Thus, Utilize Health was born.

Jessica has always been attracted to entrepreneurial activities. At 18 years of age, she co-founded Good Life And Healthy Mind (GLAHM) Camp, a beauty and self-esteem building boot camp for girls with neurological disabilities. The camp was one of the finalists for the 2006 Chicago Innovation Award. In addition, Jessica received the 2008 Emerging Leader Award and was inducted into the National Spinal Cord Injury Association (NSCIA) Hall of Fame.

Jessica remains active in her community, currently sitting on the National Spinal Cord Injury Association Tennessee Chapter Board of Directors. Jessica received her B.A. from Louisiana State University and her M.Ed with a focus in Organizational Leadership from Vanderbilt University. She currently resides in Nashville, Tennessee, with her husband, Adam, and service dog, Ozzie.

Utilize Health Chief Operating Officer, Adam Harthcock, is a healthcare professional by trade. He has worked as an athletic trainer in multiple settings that include outpatient orthopedic rehabilitation and college/high school athletics. His healthcare related experience also includes corporate wellness and fitness. 

Adam and Jessica met one year after Jessica was injured. Adam was hired as one of the trainers to help Jessica with rehabilitation. Five years later, they married.

Adam received his Master of Business Administration from Louisiana State University and his Bachelor of Science in Athletic Training/Sports Medicine from Central Michigan University. Adam joins Jessica as Board Member for the Tennessee Chapter of the National Spinal Cord Injury Association.

_________________________________________________________________________

Press 

_________________________________________________________________________

Credits 

Thank you to a fantastic team who helped with Utilize Health's crowdfunding efforts! 

Grant Howard, Video Producer 
Peanut Butter Printing. PBP is a promotional products and custom apparel company that is saving lives. For every $100 spent at PBP the company gives 10 meals to children dying of malnutrition.

They are ready to start building the web application and matching algorithms as soon as we give them the green light. Some of the funding will also be used towards hiring a User Experience (UX) Developer. As you can imagine, many Utilize Health users will have limited upper extremity mobility. We want to ensure an easy and seamless user experience for anyone who uses Utilize Health's website.If we do not reach our entire goal, we will have to critically limit the scope of our web application. Certain features, like scheduling an appointment directly through the Utilize Health platform, may not be available. The more funds we raise, the more intuitive the web application will be. In addition, Utilize Health will be able to offer more features for our users. Below are some mocks ups of the website: (Note: This is subject to change based on the amount of funding we receive.) _________________________________________________________________________How Does it Work?Utilize Health is incredibly easy to use! After signing up, a user will be prompted to go through the following steps:1. Create a User Profile: A user will be prompted to fill out a personal profile. You'll provide us with easy information like name, date of birth, and zip code.   2. Fill Out a Health Questionnaire: A user will be prompted to fill out a health questionnaire. You'll be asked questions about your injury/prognosis, date of onset, etc. You set the guidelines for us. Are you willing to travel? If so, how far? We will use all this information to best help you. The more information you provide us with, the better we can assist you in finding the best therapies and facilities for you!3. Browse Your Matches: Based on the information you provided us, we match you with the best possible facilities and therapies. Click on each match to read about the types of therapies and treatments the facility offers.4. Schedule a Visit: Choose the facility that you want to visit. Every facility is different. Every patient is different. After reading through your matches, you choose the facility that best suits your needs.
What is a Patient Advocate Subscription?Utilize Health offers a baseline matching service FREE to all of its members. This is the core of what we do. We also understand that some patients need more than that. In addition to our free service, Utilize Health offers a paid upgrade subscription service for members. Think of this service as more of a concierge-like service for patients. Patient Advocates can assist patients with obtaining scripts from their physicians, providing additional research on a particular type of therapy, and/or discuss patient matches more in depth. Having a Patient Advocate Subscription allows a patient or family member to schedule a call anytime they want with one of Utilize Health's Patient Advocates. Our Patient Advocates will also send periodic emails to check in to make sure things are going well. _________________________________________________________________________Perks and Prizes 
See below for a complete offering of all our prizes and perks. What is a Hatch Print? It's really cool...trust us. It's a poster that is designed and printed in a unique way. Go to www.hatchshowprint.com for more info. *Note: Prizes are subject to change in regards to font, color, and design used on all promotional items. The Hatch Print is on backorder. Estimated time of delivery is September 2014. _________________________________________________________________________The Impact11 million people in the United States have a physical disability due to a neurological condition such as a stroke or a spinal cord injury. The types of conditions that Utilize Health helps are life-altering. As you read above, Utilize Health has already matched more than 100 patients to therapies and facilities across the United States. Here's some more of what patients and their family members have said:“You have given me something that no one has been able to give me - hope. After my son suffered a closed head traumatic brain injury, the doctors said he would remain in a vegetative state. My wife and I have been searching for treatment options since his accident. When we were referred to Utilize Health, our Patient Advocate helped us learn about what options were out there. Thank you and to all of the Utilize Health Team.”"It's been 21 years since I have participated in PT and OT. I look forward to starting a new kind of physical therapy." When you back our Indiegogo campaign, the impact for patients with neurological conditions is life-changing. When patients are aware of what resources are available, they can make informed decisions about their healthcare. Utilize Health takes its philosophy a step further. Not only do we help patients learn about resources, we help patients and their families locate and engage with those facilities and therapies. _________________________________________________________________________Other Ways You Can HelpIf you can’t contribute financially, there's several other meaningful ways you can help us:

Share Utilize Health's Indiegogo Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and other social media platforms. Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools at the bottom of this page :) It makes it quick and easy!

Email friends and family to request their support. We'll even give you a template to use. Just ask us, and we'll email it to you. 
Let's make some noise!! Together, we can help patients with neurological disabilities and their families find the resources that they need to maximize their potential for recovery. Join us, and together we can make a real difference in people's lives! _________________________________________________________________________
Meet the Founders
Utilize Health Founder and Chief Executive Officer, Jessica Harthcock, functions as a T3 paraplegic. As mentioned, Jessica was paralyzed at 17 and spent years traveling in search of highly specialized rehabilitation treatments that eventually helped her learn to walk again. Jessica has been connecting patients to facilities and therapies on her own for several years as a service to other patients. In May 2013, she decided to scale her efforts and create a technology-enabled service. Thus, Utilize Health was born.Jessica has always been attracted to entrepreneurial activities. At 18 years of age, she co-founded Good Life And Healthy Mind (GLAHM) Camp, a beauty and self-esteem building boot camp for girls with neurological disabilities. The camp was one of the finalists for the 2006 Chicago Innovation Award. In addition, Jessica received the 2008 Emerging Leader Award and was inducted into the National Spinal Cord Injury Association (NSCIA) Hall of Fame.Jessica remains active in her community, currently sitting on the National Spinal Cord Injury Association Tennessee Chapter Board of Directors. Jessica received her B.A. from Louisiana State University and her M.Ed with a focus in Organizational Leadership from Vanderbilt University. She currently resides in Nashville, Tennessee, with her husband, Adam, and service dog, Ozzie.Utilize Health Chief Operating Officer, Adam Harthcock, is a healthcare professional by trade. He has worked as an athletic trainer in multiple settings that include outpatient orthopedic rehabilitation and college/high school athletics. His healthcare related experience also includes corporate wellness and fitness. Adam and Jessica met one year after Jessica was injured. Adam was hired as one of the trainers to help Jessica with rehabilitation. Five years later, they married.Adam received his Master of Business Administration from Louisiana State University and his Bachelor of Science in Athletic Training/Sports Medicine from Central Michigan University. Adam joins Jessica as Board Member for the Tennessee Chapter of the National Spinal Cord Injury Association._________________________________________________________________________Press _________________________________________________________________________

Credits Thank you to a fantastic team who helped with Utilize Health's crowdfunding efforts! Grant Howard, Video Producer Peanut Butter Printing. PBP is a promotional products and custom apparel company that is saving lives. For every $100 spent at PBP the company gives 10 meals to children dying of malnutrition.

story:
My name is Cynthia. When my fiance and I learned of our pregnancy we were elated! Just absolutely overjoyed and excited. At 15 weeks we decided to move to SWFL to share this pregnancy with my parents being that it would be their first grandchild. They too were overjoyed. The transfer from our original restaurant location to the SWFL restaurant location was NOT done properly by our manager which means that we didn't have a job to pick up where we left off in saving up for this wonderful gift God had blessed us with. After fighting for our jobs and persuing the correction of someone else's mistake out of our control we finally got a schedule with our new location. That was enough stress to croak a horse and it took six and half weeks to do. The weekend before we are to start at this new location my Godmother is hit by a car which took off after leaving her to die in the street. This new locaiton couldn't assign a comparible position of what we were in the original restaurant; not even close. My fiance was a head line chef and is now bussing tables for $5 an hour and the tips alone are barely enough to cover gas for the time between shifts. The $5/hr. doesn't even cover the amount of insurance deductible that weekly comes out of his paychecks. Every week we are more and more behind because the hours to wage ratio isn't enough to cover the arears that have accrued from the transfer not being done properly or in a timely manner. What has added up over those weeks that we didn't work is being taken in full, taking every cent of his paycheck every week forcing us to live on his bussing tips which is no where near the amount servers make. It's calculated at just barely 1% of what the house makes while he's on the floor.

We started at this transferred location a the weekend after my Godmother gets hit by a car and dies on the scene. Her memorial service is held the following weekend. I go into labor that night at her reception dinner. I gave birth to Kilee three and a half months early in my opinion due to the stress that the past 3 months had brought on. The neonatal doctors that were on scene when I told them that she is coming whether anyone likes it or not informed us that the chances of her survival depended on whether or not they were going to be able to fit the smallest tube they had available down her tiny little throat so that they could stabilze her. Luckily enough she was just barely big enough for the smallest equipment they had available. The percentage of Kilee being considered a normal functioning member of society because of her brain bleed status is less than 2%. We literally prayed to God throughout the entire birth. Kilee is now 1 month and 2 days old and fighting hard to stay alive. The brain bleed she was born with is still in critical condition and has only retracted a very small amount. Every day she makes it through is a blessing and at any moment she could be called up into God's kingdom to become one of his angels. We have prayer chains that have formed all across the country. Sadly enough though prayer doesn't pay our bills that have accumulated throughout this whole process.

The following is the breakdown of the funds that we are looking for to help us keep a roof over our head and to have a home for when or if Kilee is released from the hospital. They are also going to help us keep our only form of transportation and maintain decent progressive payments torwards all the medical bills and appointment fees that have accumulated so far... I have no idea how much this event will come to once she is released which is estimated to be February of 2013 if everything goes the best way.

5 months of Car Payments: $1500

Gas/wear & tear: $1400 (if she isn't transferred to a hospital further away)

Utilities/Rent: $3000

Baby Gear: $1500 (we weren't prepared for her arrival to be this early we hadn't even started putting together a list of the necessities)

The rest will literally go to medical bills and appointment fees for the first couple of months of Kilee's life if and or when she is released from the hospital.

The contributions that are provided will be deeply appreciated and we as a family will forever be thankful. I don't have a materialistic or monetary "perk" to give in return only our gratitude and the gift of God's blessing to all who are helpful to others. I wish we could do more to express how grateful we would be to even get one helping hand from this site. I believe there are still truly genuine souls still out there that care for their fellow man and know that God wouldn't hand us these kinds of things if we couldn't handle them.

If you can't contribute anything financially that is completely understandable, but I do ask to help us get this story out publicly, spread the word that one of God's tiniest angels is in dire straights and needs help. I know he will return the gratitude to those who believe in him and bless those who have faith. If anyone has suggestions or comments please feel free to share those as well.

 

Thank you so much for your time and kind consideration.

The Swicegoods

story:
Nick Thomson - Creator of the Circuband and Elite Athlete 

Elastic Bands are used in almost every gym and clinic in the world due to their portability, cost and ease of use. However, the pain point for every user is the same – there is no way to measure them! That's why we designed Circuband - The Ultimate Resistance Band.

 

From next year Circuband will include an Advanced Stretch Sensor to Monitor All Forms of Resistance Training 

 

Even without the sensor, Circuband has some significant points of difference...

1. Circuband comes with a range of attachments that can be used with any resistance band less than 38mm wide (Most Elastic Bands)

2. The length of the bands can be changed making each exercise harder or easier. This is important when maintaining good form or when there's not much room.  

3. The band can either be used in a closed or open configuration meaning that you get "All in One" functionality.

 

 

This unique design allowed us to incorporate StretchSense's world class sensors..

1. The sensors are built into a separate and non-adjustable component meaning that they work irrespective of what length or resistance the adjoining bands are.

2. The sensors are designed and built by a separate company, StretchSense, and are some of the most accurate sensors in the world at monitoring stretch of an object.  

3. They are charged through micro-USB and operate via a 10 channel Bluetooth Sensor meaning that both the user, specialist or clinician have ultimate connectivity between devices and the app.

 

The potential of Circuband is huge. The sensor can transmit data on all kinds of resisted movement and will now only record what you are lifting but also tell you how well you are lifting. This is tremendously important for anybody who is serious about training or rehabilitating athletes using elastic bands. Not only will results and progress be easily obtained, but the research will paint a much clearer picture of what is working and what is not when it comes time to formulate best practice.

Who can use our Products?

Our Products are used by a huge variety of people including those from professional sports teams. However, anybody can use them because of the way they are designed. Even though the maximum resistance can be made to 120lbs, that come come right down to 5-10lbs if required by simply adjusting the length of the band. 

We have plenty of videos showing you how to use Circuband and you can request one for use in certain environments if you need some inspiration.

Our Success to Date

After 2 years our customers comprise of some of the best sports teams, athletes and organisations in the world including the All Blacks, The Australian Cricket Team, The New Zealand Army, Olympic Athletes and about 1000 members of the New Zealand public. As a result of this success we were nominated for the Deloitte Rising Star and NZ Innovation Awards and received a project grant from the NZ government who decided to step up and help incorporate the latest Sensors into our patented design. They are dedicating a team of designers and engineers to help make this all happen and they will provide half the funding necessary to make this happen. The catch is that we need to fund the other half. The reason that they are backing us is that these sensors will allow physiotherapy and strength training to be measured more closely than ever before. This will reduce the cost of physical therapy long term and also allow people lead healthier lives. However, it's not just the New Zealand Government taking notice. We have also had interest from NFL teams, Under Armour, Apple and many other High Profile Specialists who know a tonne about fitness.



However, none of this means much unless we receive your help and there is a very easy way for you to do just that!

What You Can Expect From Us

A Circuband customer is a happy one because we appreciate that people are investing their hard earned money in exchange for our products. We have always seen business through the eyes of the consumer. This philosophy not only allows us to design effective and practical products that actually work, but it also ensures that the customer gets all the support they need from day one. After all, the only reason we have succeeded to date is word of mouth and a solid product! 

What Can You Expect From Us In The Years to Come?

In the years to come we’ll see Virtual Reality Integration to enhance the user experience once again and increase people’s motivation to work out even more. This will be done through VR programmes that allow people to complete every exercise more confidently and with the feeling that they are wherever they want to be in the world at any given time.

So how is the government investing in Circuband?

Callaghan Innovation is a government agency that helps businesses succeed through Research &Development. They have seen the potential of this project and have offered to cover 50% of all of our R&D including the App development, 3D Printing, Design, Engineering and Testing meaning that this project is in excellent hands. Essentially this means that your contributions are essentially being matched by our government so let's make them feel the burn too!

So I've never heard of Circuband before... How do I use one?

At Circuband we make sure that our customers have the very best support from day one. All products are accompanied by a booklet and you'll also have a wealth of information at your fingertips. Everything you will need to know can be accessed via Youtube, Vimeo, Facebook, Instagram and our website at www.circuband.com. In the months to come we will also be introducing formal classes where trainers or customers can become certified in using and teaching with Circuband. This qualification will be available in New Zealand from October 2016 but will be distributed out to the rest of the world in 2017.

 
Okay, I want one but where can I use it?
 
Circuband is made from strong, high grade rubber and plastic components so it is safe to take anywhere. However, the Circuband Sensor will need further testing and analysis before we know you can take it into the water or on an aeroplane but we'll keep you posted. 
 
 
We have all the videos you need to get started..
 
 
 

 

A Brief Summary of our Achievements from Daniel Thomson, Co-Founder of Circuband

Hi Guys,

You may already know that we started Circuband from scratch around 2 and a bit years ago. What you may not know is that our customers include the All Blacks, The Australian Cricket Team, The New Zealand Army, Some Olympians and about 1000 New Zealanders. We have also been nominated for the Deloitte Rising Star Award and the NZ Innovation Awards. However, the coolest achievement was when the NZ government decided to step up and help us incorporate Sensors into our Circubands. They are dedicating a team of designers and engineers to make it all happen and they provide half the money. The catch is, we need to fund the other half. Now these sensors will allow physiotherapy and strength training to be measured more closely than ever before which will in turn make our health systems cheaper to run as well as making people fitter all around the planet. As a result of this innovation we have had interest from NFL teams, Under Armour, Apple and many other High Profile Specialists who know a tonne about fitness.

Even if you don't pay enough to get a Circuband I'll still send you a personal note of thanks and your name will be forever enshrined on the webpage for as long as can possibly have you up there. You'll also get monthly information if you choose to so you don't miss out on future deals. 


We would appreciate anything! Honestly! By helping us you're basically helping us prove that Kiwis can kick the worlds ass in other things other than Rugby! 

We would really appreciate your help! It is purely the finances that are preventing us from making these wonderful tools available to the world!

Sincerely, 

Daniel Thomson - 27 Year old Entrepreneur from New Zealand

story:
IndieGogo Special: FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE!


The Cold Shoulder is a timesaving, comfortable, scientifically proven way to burn calories without exercise, sold directly to you at a wholesale price. We have thousands of users seeing great results. Our vest uses mild, comfortable cold exposure to extract calories directly from your body. You simply take it out of the freezer, put it on, and go about your daily activities.

The idea has appeared in numerous places:


The Cold Shoulder turns the idea into a convenient product that has featured on international television.



TESTIMONIALS


More testimonials

"I can literally "feel" my metabolism spinning faster after wearing this for about 45 minutes or so. I've been averaging just under 1 lb/week weight loss with no change in eating or drinking." - Dan

"I've been using this vest daily since it arrived. I wear it twice a day for an hour to an hour and a half. I actually really enjoy the cold, and it has done a good job of accelerating my weight loss." - Andrew Clinton

"Since receiving the vest, I've lost about two thirds of a pound each week (for 8 weeks) but I don't wear it as much as I could, hence I believe 2 full sessions instead of just one would bear better results. I've also noticed improved sleep" - Francois Turcotte

"I've been wearing the vest twice a day since it arrived and I've been losing approximately 1lb a week with no changes to my diet or exercise habits. The vest is very comfortable." -- Shawn

"One of the best cold vests out there and the guy behind them knows what he is talking about." -- David Choy.


Why you’ll love The Cold Shoulder

1. Backed by 50 years of science. Scientists have studied how mild cold exposure can burn calories since the 1960s.

2. Burns calories without exercise. Whether you’re a gym rat or a couch potato, our ice vest will burn excess calories for you – the equivalent of up to 500 calories a day. This can more than double the calorie deficit you'd get from dieting alone.

3. Saves time. It takes about 30s to get the vest out of the freezer and put it on, and then continue with your day. Compare that to the hours out of your day it takes to visit the gym once you include travel, change, and shower time.

4. It’s comfortable. No shivering! After trying it a few times, you’ll hardly notice you’re wearing it.

5. It gets more effective the more you use it. Your body adapts to the idea of turning on your internal furnace to burn calories, making the vest more effective the more you use it.

6. Has other benefits such as improving sleep, helping alleviate aches and pains, helping to "cure" people who always feel cold, among others.

7. Sold direct at wholesale prices. Expect to pay significantly more once this is available in retail stores. There’s no middleman on IndieGogo. We’ll manufacture your vest and ship it directly to you.


The Cold Shoulder featured in:


Our story

I sell a vest full of ice that's designed to burn calories.

I'm a NASA scientist and a professor. What you're about to read is going to sound like science fiction, but it's not. Scientists have spent decades studying how mild cold exposure can enhance calorie burn. Quietly, and without fuss, the evidence for cold exposure induced calorie burn has been accumulating. It's time to bring the science to the public. That's what I'm here to do: to explain to you what is probably the most novel, evidence-based calorie-burning idea that's come out of the scientific community in many years, and to tell you how you can take advantage of it without pain, without discomfort, and without taking more than 2 minutes of time out of your busy day. With IndieGogo's help, we'll be able to bring this vest to the masses at a reasonable price.

Let's be blunt: there is no magic pill for weight loss, and The Cold Shoulder PRO Calorie Burning Vest is no exception to that rule. The cold, hard truth is that the foundation of weight control is your diet. In order to maintain a healthy weight, do what grandma told you: eat your veggies, cut the fat off your steak, and avoid junk food, especially sweets. If you continue to eat junk, then no amount of exercise, cold exposure, or weirdly named supplements or powders will help you lose weight. The vest can burn up to 500 calories per day if used as directed, but you can easily nullify the effect by eating an extra 500 extra calories. So don't expect that you can continue to eat junk food, wear the vest, and lose weight. You can't. But if you are already eating well and getting moderate exercise and want to accelerate your calorie-burning efforts by burning excess calories while at rest, there's no simpler, easier, or more time-efficient way than wearing our vest.


Whether you're an athlete, an actor/model, or a couch potato, almost everybody today could benefit from burning a few more calories without expending time or effort. Note that The Cold Shoulder PRO Calorie Burning Vest cannot claim to diagnose, treat, prevent, or cure any disease, illness or condition.


The problem - Exercise is not the only way to burn calories

The first thing I always hear when I say I’m touting a “cold vest” is, “I don’t like being cold.” But think of all the other crazy things people do in order to try to lose excess fat. Starving themselves? Eating zero-calorie clay just to feel full, which carries a risk of arsenic poising? Exhausting themselves in the gym? Ingesting questionable supplements that, if they work at all, have side effects like insomnia or over‐stimulation? How about wearing a corset just to appear thinner? Drug injections? Liposuction? Freezing fat cells? Gastro‐intestinal surgery? Considering these options, wearing a cool, calorie-burning vest is pretty tame in comparison. The Cold Shoulder has no known side effects. Users who start skeptical end up wearing it routinely, and even find they look forward to putting it on at the end of a long day.

There is an aspect of the calorie equation that has been largely neglected for too long. There is a huge hole in our collective knowledge. Although exercise is definitely good, most people think that exercise is the only way to burn excess calories. But it's not.


The Solution - Burn excess calories using mild cold exposure

In addition to exercise, there’s another, much less well known but scientifically well-established way to burn calories. It’s called mild cold exposure. Basically, if you extract heat from your body, even if you’re sitting on your couch in front of the T.V., your body will need to burn calories to stay warm. This is a scientific fact – and I should know, since I work at NASA with a group of scientists that study ice. The trick is to figure out how to harness mild cold exposure without being uncomfortable.

The idea of using mild cold exposure to burn calories has slowly started to percolate into the popular media. Articles on the subject have appeared in many places, including the venues mentioned at the top of this page. The problem is that they often recommend painful or impractical methods of cold exposure, like cold showers or ice baths. Very few people have the courage to try that.

I was studying the science of how cold exposure burns calories, when I had a light-bulb moment. I thought, "If cold exposure burns calories, there’s got to be a way I can harness its power to help ordinary people increase their calorie burn." That’s when I began the work that eventually led me to develop The Cold Shoulder. It's a vest that drapes ice over the shoulder and back, and extracts calories while you wear it. 

There are two versions of the vest; our previous KickStarter campaign introduced the first Cold Shoulder Calorie Burning Vest, which we now call The Classic. It's a finely tailored garment, suitable to wear in public, even with a suit and tie or in a formal setting.  In fact, some of our supporters who own the Classic wear it to work, one woman even wears it when she's playing her instrument in an orchestra under the hot stage lights!

For those who don't need a fancy, formal vest, we've designed the PRO, which is less expensive, one-size-fits-all, and simpler:

Now powered with CryoMAX long-lasting gel!

We are proud to announce that The Cold Shoulder has entered into an exclusive partnership with CryoMAX in the calorie burning vest market. CryoMAX gel is a patented, food-grade glycerin (which basically means it's so safe you could drink it without any ill-effects).  CryoMAXgel is flexible even when frozen and can stay cold up to 8 hours, as their own scientific tests have shown:


Does The Cold Shoulder work?

I have put it to the scientific test and proved this vest's efficacy in controlled trials. Here are a few before-and-after shots after just 3 weeks of using The Cold Shoulder Classic:

Considering all the crazy things that people do to burn excess fat, from starvation diets to liposuction, a vest that burns calories while you continue about your day seems pretty tame, don't you think?


How does it work?

The Science Behind Cold-exposure Based Calorie Burn

You don't need to be a scientist to understand that too much cold exposure – such as, say, floating in the North Atlantic after the Titanic sank – can extract so many calories so quickly that it can kill you. On the other hand, mild cold exposure is perfectly healthy, and has been studied by scientists for decades as a way to burn calories.

For example, Olympic swimmers burn many more calories per day than other Olympic athletes, and it has nothing to do with the exercise. It’s the water. They spend their day in water that’s 20 degrees (F) below their body temperature, and this temperature difference makes them burn way more calories than the exercise alone.

Any mild cold exposure causes your body to burn extra calories, whether it’s a cold day outside, air conditioning set too high, or your skin being in contact with a cold object. Scientists have been studying the effects of mild cold exposure for decades, and it’s a well documented fact that mild cold exposure induces calorie burn.

Our vest, The Cold Shoulder, has ice draped over the shoulder and across the back:

Comfort

The ice locations on The Cold Shoulder are the most comfortable places to put the ice because that's where your body has the fewest nerve endings. It's also the most scientifically valid place to put the ice because, just under the skin of the shoulders and back, there's a type of tissue called Brown Adipose Tissue (BAT). BAT burns calories when you encounter mild cold. Our clinical trials show that wearing our vest twice a day for about an hour burns up to 500 calories more per day than you'd burn without it.


How to maximize effectiveness of The Cold Shoulder

We'd like to emphasize exactly under what conditions The Cold Shoulder can induce the burning of excess calories. Basically, you need to be in an environment where you are otherwise at a comfortable temperature, and you are not exercising. If you are sitting down at rest in a room (or your car, or whatever) that is at a comfortable temperature, then wearing The Cold Shoulder directly from the freezer, and with a shirt underneath, will extract heat from your body and cause you to burn extra calories in order to stay warm.

If you are in a hot environment, the The Cold Shoulder will help you stay cool, but it won't burn excess calories, because you're not cold. If you are working out in the gym, then The Cold Shoulder can help you stay cool, and can even help you cool down after a workout, but will not enhance your calorie burn, because you're not cold in that environment. If the vest is not cold, or if the ice has all melted, it will not induce excess calorie burn. Remember that the goal of The Cold Shoulder is to force you to burn calories at a time when you otherwise would not: sitting down, at rest, in a comfortable environment at room temperature.

So, to burn excess calories, wear The Cold Shoulder sitting on the couch watching the game, or in front of your computer, or in your car during your commute. Any time you'd normally just be sitting around comfortable---that's the time to don The Cold Shoulder PRO Calorie Burning Vest and enhance your calorie burn.


Example trial result - Nick Hamilton

Below is a graph of the body fat of Nick Hamilton over a 16-week period. Nick was one of our early testers of The Cold Shoulder. He was on a 16 week, tightly controlled diet and exercise regimen. The only change Nick made in the last 2 weeks was to start using The Cold Shoulder ice vest. You can see how much it accelerated his fat loss.


Evidence from independent scientists


For more info on cold exposure and calorie burn, see this page. Note that some of it is rather technical---definitely not light reading. But if you want some of the cold, hard scientific facts from independent researchers, this is the place to start. Most of the research was done even before I conceived of The Cold Shoulder, so you know it's independent and objective.


The PRO Vest Shots


Our Mission

We want to bring the most functional, comfortable, and stylish clothing-based calorie-burning aid to the global market. We want to spread the word that burning calories doesn’t have to require time-consuming gym visits, sweaty exercise, crazy calorie-restricted diet fads, or taking untested, questionable supplements with unknown side effects. Instead, we advocate that a healthy lifestyle must contain not only a healthy diet and moderate exercise, but also a regular dose of mild cold exposure.


Why we need you!

Although we have the designs and prototypes finished and our manufacturer stands ready to produce the vests, the cost of production is high unless we fulfill minimum order quantities. In order to cover the costs of fabric and production at this level, we need to commit to this minimum order quantity to secure the best deal, which can then be passed onto you, with special rewards exclusively offered here on IndieGogo!

Will it fit me?

We have tried The Cold Shoulder PRO vest on people with chest sizes ranging from 36 inches up to 60 inches, and it fits no problem. It's a one-size-fits-all vest with elastic straps and buckles, both of which can be adjusted to fit bodies with a huge range of sizes and shapes.

Production plan

We have a large, responsive manufacturer standing ready to fulfill as many as 8,000 vests within a 3-month time frame. To ensure quality construction, we’re overseeing manufacturing of our vests and will provide regular updates to our IndieGogo supporters. The CryoMAX ice is made in the USA. CryoMAX sells about $100M worth of their gel ice each year, and will have no problem producing large volumes of ice for us on short notice.  Once the vests are made, we’ll prepare them for shipment (at most 1-2 weeks), and then ship them to your door (2-3 days Domestic US, or 2-4 weeks International).

Note that the PRO has about 9 lbs (4 kg) worth of CryoMAX gel, which is why shy shipping is so expensive due to the heavy weight.


Our Guarantee

We are confident that you will be happy with your vests and the results it will produce, but if for any reason you’re not completely satisfied, just send it back (you pay shipping, and please give us a “heads up” first), and we'll repair or replace your vest and ship it back to you free of charge.


THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

Please take a look at the rewards - we hope you'll take advantage of our special early bird offer, but any contribution big or small helps lots! We'd also be so grateful if you would help us share this campaign via email, FB, and twitter!

story:
VHOOP is made for those who are serious about losing belly fat and getting into shape. VHOOP is suitable for busy people because it can be used anywhere at anytime due to the portability of the product. The workout does not take a lot of time. VHOOP can be used indoors, outdoors, or any open space. Through the App, you are able to compete with friends and even the rest of the world. See who comes up on top and share the results. Other Hoops can be forgotten or thrown into the closet but with the notification feature it will motivate you to workout. Other fitness products cause joint pain while VHOOP is safe due to the high quality materials. Never miss a workout again.

 

VHOOP allows for an interactive workout which can be displayed on your smartphone via Bluetooth. This enhances your workout and you will be able to see the numerical value behind each workout unlike your typical workout equipments. Due to its design, you can use VHOOP anywhere at anytime.  

  • Portability: Take VHOOP wherever you go  
  • Safety: VHOOP is made up of soft materials so it is very safe to use
  • Application: The only trainer you need is the one on the app
  • Notification: The App will notify you so you don’t miss a workout

Our vision is to make people healthy and happy with smart fitness equipments and services. With the development of civilization, the life expectancy of people has become longer and health issues are an important topic. Exercising has been proven to increase life expectancy but it also put a burden on most people. We are dedicated in making exercise equipments with Internet technology that is fun yet rewarding for people to use. VHOOP is our first product in making this change happen.

story:
N A M A S T E

Y O G A   F O R   E V E R Y O N E

YOGA IS FOR EVERYONE - regardless of  body type, flexibility, or age.   As an inflexible yogi who has often been shamed for being “too skinny”, I want to be a role model of BODY POSITIVITY and healthy, holistic living for my students.  I've gained a lot of mental and physical strength through my Yoga practice,  after enduring many years of bad relationships with men and my body.  What I feel very strongly about NOW, is my potential to help eradicate BODY SHAMING, encourage FITNESS OVER FLATTERY, and empower others to truly understand that everyBODY - every life - is worth CELEBRATING.

Contrary to popular belief body shaming can be used to belittle not only big people, but people at the opposite end of the size spectrum, and everywhere in between.  I've had people I just met very casually say things to me like:  "YOU NEED TO PUT SOME MEAT ON THOSE BONES," and "you need to eat".  Although body shaming is not something I experience every day like many people, it did play a big role in many of my past RELATIONSHIPS. So, when it happens, I'm immediately reminded of how very VIOLENT it feels - like your literal being-ness is under attack.  I can only imagine how people who regularly endure extreme body shaming must feel.  That is what makes me all the more passionate about inspiring people to become mentally AND physically fit.  When the mind and body are healthy and balanced,  YOU BECOME STRONGER than anyone else's opinion of you.  

Yoga is one of very few forms of physical conditioning that emphasizes training the mind as well as the body, which is why it's so very popular, and powerful.

Yoga was a truly TRANSFORMATIONAL tool in helping me to heal from unhealthy relationships, as well as overcome many other life challenges.  Once I started a Yoga and meditation  practice,  I learned to put mental and physical FITNESS FIRST.   A slender but strong body became more important to me than whether or not anyone found it sexy.

The focus of fitness should be on health, not body type. When you feed your mind nourishing thoughts, and eat for sustenance not emotional support, the body will transform accordingly. What that transformation looks like is different for everyone. What’s the same for everyone, is an innate desire to feel valued, and loved.  

YOGA TAUGHT ME TO LOVE myself, and everyone in my life, more completely. 

Now, I WANT TO HELP OTHERS find that same love and value for themselves through YOGA.  

With your support, I would like to complete a month-long Yoga Teacher Training course in July 2019, to become certified to teach Yoga wherever I am in the world. YOUR BACKING WOULD NOT ONLY HELP ME, but all of my potential students. I want my students to leave my class feeling mentally and physically strong enough to build the life of their DREAMS.   Moreover, as part of my yoga teacher training, I will be required to share the transformational power of yoga with THE CHILDREN OF JODIE O’SHAE ORPHANAGE here in Bali.

Your backing will surely change a lot of lives for the better:  not only my life, but the lives of everyone I inspire to LOVE yoga!

 

K A R M A 

Your contribution will help cover the cost of the month-long Yoga Teacher Training course, as well as books, meals, and lodging throughout the course.

WHEN YOU GIVE, YOU RECEIVE.

In gratitude for your generosity, I can offer a few small, but MEANINGFUL GIFTS:

 

P R A N A Y A M A

As part of my yoga teacher training, I will be required to share the transformational power of yoga with THE CHILDREN OF JODIE O’SHAE ORPHANAGE here in Bali.  A PERCENTAGE OF THE COURSE FEE IS ALSO DONATED to the orphanage.  

PRANAYAMA is the extension of life-force energy. WE ALL RISE WHEN WE LIFT OTHERS.  I hope it truly enlivens you to know that your generosity is helping to power an important philanthropic cause!
