story:
Check out Femometer's Latest Indiegogo Updates >




Femometer is an intelligent Basal Body Temperature (BBT) thermometer that syncs to your phone, tracks and predicts your cycle, and alerts you to important natural changes in your body. Compatible with Android and iOS smart devices.

Femometer is for every woman, whether you’re tracking your period, timing your cycle to prevent pregnancy, or getting ready to start a family.




Whether you think you might be pregnant, or your’re simply trying to not ruin your favorite pair of underwear, Femometer can tell you when and why your period is coming.


Use the power of Basal Body Temperature to calculate your 6-day fertility window for pregnancy.


Know the days that you’re at high risk for getting pregnant.

Used in conjunction with other contraception methods, the Fertility Awareness Method decreases risk of pregnancy.

The first trimester is an important period for collecting your data to share with your doctor. Your temperature should stay elevated during pregnancy, and you should report any significant changes to your doctor as soon as possible.

With Femometer and the power of the smartphone she already uses every day, she can better understand what’s going on inside and make smart, safe decisions - making Femometer the perfect gift for anyone!

Phase I Hospital Trials are being conducted with women and doctors in three hospitals: Huzhou Maternity & Child Care Hospital,  Hunan Provincial Maternity & Child Care Hospital, Zhongshan Maternity & Child Care Hospital.

Basal Body Temperature, also known as waking body temperature, is your lowest body temperature of the day. To get an accurate reading, you must take your temperature orally when you first wake up in the morning, before you even sit up in bed. And you'll need to use a Femometer (Basal Thermometer), which is sensitive enough to measure tiny changes in body temperature. 

Before ovulation, your BBT probably ranges from 97.2 to about 97.8 degrees Fahrenheit. But two or three days after you ovulate, hormonal changes cause a rise of 0.4 to 1.0 degree in your BBT, which lasts at least until your next period. If you become pregnant, your temperature will stay elevated throughout your pregnancy.

By charting your BBT for a few months, you'll be able to see whether there's a pattern to your cycle, which helps predict ovulation the next time around – as well as the best days to have sex. BBT charts can also help your doctor pinpoint the cause of any infertility issues. If certain phases of your cycle are short, you may have a hormonal imbalance, for example.

Cervical Fluid, also known as vaginal discharge, is completely normal and healthy. Its thickness indicates when your estrogen levels rise ahead of ovulation. When it reaches a clear, egg-white consistency, then this is an indicator of ovulation. After ovulation, progesterone takes over and your cervical fluid becomes dry or sticky.

WHY ORDER NOW?

We will process shipments in the order that we receive them. Those who pre-order first through this campaign will receive their Femometer from the very first production batches after they are fully tested and ready for mass production.

WHEN WILL WE START SHIPPING?

We plan to ship Femometer in the first quarter-2016 timeframe. The Femometer team will keep you up to date on progress and on the expected delivery date of your order.

WHERE WILL WE SHIP?

We are able to ship worldwide. Shipping costs are already included for USA. There is a change of $6 for shipping to the rest of the world. For multi-packs (Femometer 2 packs, 10 packs or more), shipping charges decrease per unit. Please see perk details for the shipping cost that applies to you.

  1. ABOUT
  2. TECH
  3. SAFETY
  4. SHIPPING
  5. CUSTOMER SERVICE

    6. Please contact support@femometer.com with any questions or requests for changes in your order.

    (back to top)




    What is Femometer?    		 Femometer is a smart fertility tracker that is empowering women around the world by equipping them with data. The Femometer includes an intelligent tracking algorithm that learns to detect even the smallest fluctuations in your fertility cycle. With Femometer, women everywhere are empowered to understand their own bodies through data.




    How do I use Femometer?    		 Using Femometer is as simple as taking your temperature in the morning. To get an accurate reading, take your temperature orally when you first wake up in the morning, before you even sit up in bed. After using Femometer, your unique temperature data is sent directly to your smartphone which will produce comprehensive and easy-to-understand charts about your health. Femometer can be set to notify you of your period, fertility window, PMS, and when it’s time to see a doctor. Join us, we’re starting a revolution of knowledgeable, empowered women just like you.



    How does Femometer work?    		 Femometer’s advanced technology is hyper sensitive to capturing the slightest fluctuation in body temperature to within one hundredth of a degree. Femometer uses the information about your Basal Body Temperature to calculate your 6-day fertility window for pregnancy and also notify you of your period, fertility window, PMS, and when it’s time to see a doctor. With Femometer, you can own your reproductive health with smart data.



    Is Femometer accurate?    		 Femometer uses cutting-edge technology to measure your Basal Body Temperature. Basal body temperature is your lowest, and most accurate, body temperature of the day. Femometer is sensitive enough to measure tiny changes in your body temperature and translate them into interpretable data.




    How can Femometer improve my fertility tracking experience?    		 Femometer improves your fertility tracking experience in three different ways:
    1. Obtaining your data is as easy as taking your temperature in the morning.
    2. Femometer communicates with your smartphone to automatically keep track of your data and notifies you to important natural changes in your body.
    3. Our intelligent tracking algorithms learn to detect even the smallest fluctuations in your fertility cycle, sending you alerts.

    What’s in the box?
    • One Femometer
    • One Lithium CR1632 battery
    • Quick start guide


    Who is the team behind Femometer?    		 Our team consists of a group of energetic and forward-thinking entrepreneurs and specialists based in Hangzhou, China. We envision a world where women are able to take control of their body’s data in order to make smarter decisions. You can read more about us on our Team page.


    What is the Basal Body Temperature?    		 Basal Body Temperature (BBT), also known as the waken body temperature, is your lowest body temperature of the day. By charting your BBT for a few months, you’ll be able to see whether there’s a pattern to your cycle, which helps predict ovulation as well as the best days to have sex. BBT charts can also help your doctor pinpoint the cause of any infertility issues.

    (back to top)



    What is the uniqueness of Femometer’s technology?    		 Femometer uses cutting-edge technology to measure your Basal Body Temperature and is sensitive enough to measure tiny changes in your body temperature and translate them into interpretable data. You just take your temperature in the morning and Femometer will automatically sync to the app and track your your data for you.
    What features are available with Femometer? Femometer measures your Basal Body Temperature (BBT) and automatically syncs to your phone, tracks and predicts your cycle, and alerts you to important natural changes in your body.
    What material is Femometer made out of? Femometer is made of medical-grade antibacterial and nanophase materials from Japan. This allows us to make Femometer extremely durable, sterile, and lightweight.
    Does Femometer support bluetooth connectivity? Yes. Femometer uses low energy bluetooth to automatically connect with your phone to sync data.
    Is Femometer wifi-connected? No.
    What happens if my bluebooth is not working? Your data will be stored locally on the device and sent to your phone as soon as your bluetooth connection starts working again.
    Is Femometer safe? Yes. Femometer is made of medical-grade antibacterial materials.
    How accurate is the data collection? The data collection is accurate enough to measure even the tiniest changes in your body temperature and translate them into interpretable data.
    Can I share my data? Yes, you can share a secure link to view your chart with someone you choose.

    How is Femometer powered?    		 Femometer is powered via a Lithium CR1632 battery, which is similar to those you can find in your watch. You’ll be notified when the battery in your Femometer is running low so that you can change your battery
    What phones and devices will work with Femometer? Femometer currently works with both Android and iOS to provide a comprehensive and holistic view of your body so that all women are empowered to understand their own bodies through data.

    (back to top)

    Is Femometer safe? Good health is at the core of our company and our product. Femometer is made of medical-grade antibacterial materials from Japan and has been safely tested by over 300 women to check their Basal Body Temperature.
    Is Femometer safe for women of any age? Yes.
    Will my data be secure? Yes. All Femometer data is securely store on a private and encrypted network.

    (back to top)



    When will Femometer start shipping?    		 Our team wants to start empowering women to understand their own bodies through data as soon as we can. We plan to ship Femometer in the first quarter of 2016. The Femometer team will always keep you updated on our progress and on the expected delivery date of your order.


    Why do I have to wait so long for my Femometer?    		 You're helping us to build the Femometer, and we need to know how many to make before we can start production. Femometer is the first of its kind, and you'll be glad you waited. We will send you updates while we work to produce the first batch of Femometers.


    Where does Femometer ship to?    		 We want to equip women all around the world with a Femometer so that they can collect data and understand their bodies. With that in mind, we work with major courier companies so that we are able to ship worldwide. Shipping costs are already included for shipment to the US. We will include $6 for shipping to the rest of the world.
    Is the cost of shipping included? Shipping is included to the US. For all other orders, please add $6 to your order for shipping.
    How long does it take to ship? Femometer will be shipped within 2 months of a successful crowdfunding campaign. Join us in our revolution to empower women everywhere with data.

    (back to top)



    Can I get a refund?    		 Pre-orders are not refundable. By making a contribution to this campaign, you acknowledge that you understand that you are contributing to a work-in-progress and not making a direct purchase. For more details please see Indiegogo's Terms of Use.


    How do I choose more than one perk?    		 The Indiegogo system is not set up to choose multiple perks. If you would like to choose more than one perk, you will need to initiate a separate process for each pre-order. If you encounter difficulties, please email support@femometer.com and use "NEED HELP WITH ORDERING" as the subject line.
    I preordered Femometer but I didn’t get a confirmation email. How can I check the status? lease refer to this article on How to Know if Your Contribution is Successful. If there is still an issue, then you may need to contact support@indiegogo.com.
    There was an error with my contribution. What happened? Please refer to this article on common contribution errors and steps to resolve: Common Contribution Errors.

    Why am I checking out through Indiegogo?    		 We are using the Indiegogo platform to maintain transparency with our campaign: all the stats, numbers, deadlines and dollars raised are real. We want you to know that we have the full support of the crowdfunding community to help keep us accountable.


    If I have other questions, who should I contact?    		 We are receiving a lot of inquiries, and are responding as fast as possible. Please contact support@femometer.com with any other questions you may have. We’re excited to hear from you and bring on the revolution to empower women to understand their own bodies through data.

story:
Since 2006,  Njoli Brown and his team of all-star instructors have been offering classes in capoeira, Filipino martial arts, yoga, Afro-Brazilian Dance and general fitness/development programs in parks, schools and wellness venues throughout the city, across the country and internationally! 

MSMB was started in 2015 by Njoli Brown as a way to offer all of these elements under one roof.  Adults and youths can access all of the benefits of elite martial arts, fitness and wellness training. In addition to offering a playful, fun, and skill-oriented route to fitness, MSMB will act as a community hub, hosting social events and building lasting friendships.

Now we want to give our dream a place to hang its hat!

After long discussions with instructors, students and community members, we realized how many people were traveling all over the city to fill the holes left in their training and in their search for holistic wellness. We also found ourselves running from place to place in order to bring the best services to the communities we felt it important to serve.  Teaming up with some of the best martial arts, movement arts, fitness and wellness instructors from the region, the decision was made to open MSMB in New York City.
Here is where you come in. Starting a business takes a lot of money. We are not wealthy entrepreneurs, but we are skilled teachers, experienced business people, and passionate movement enthusiasts. We want to provide a space for movers of all kinds to come together, learn new things, make new friends, grow, and thrive. But we need your help to make this happen.

Here is what we need to make this real

Our goal is to raise $30,000 to make this the most epic of projects happen.

Here is what we need:

  • Space to move in! We need a lot of floor space and a bit of height. We'll need to give our landlord a deposit and show them that we can pay a few months rent up front.
  • Improvements to that space! Because of our physical requirements, we're looking at industrial spaces. It might be pretty raw when we move in. We expect we'll need to put in some flooring, install and rig some equipment, paint a bit, maybe build some walls, improve the bathrooms... anything that needs to be done to the space itself to make it a place you want to come and play in.


  • Toys! We will need various styles of yoga mats, crash pads, heavy bags, speed bags, instruments, free weights... Some of these things are very cheap (boxing & mma gloves!), but some of them are not at all (bags and weights...) and all together it adds up very quickly. The more we can raise, the more toys you all get to play with and the more gear to support your growth!
  • Amazing teachers! We'd love to believe that our doors will be beaten down on day one by all of New York's excited up and coming elite athletes! But let's be real; it takes time for a business to grow. We know the first few months will be tight, and we want to be ready for it. Our biggest operational expense will be our teachers' pay. They are the reason you will want to keep coming back here. They make us who we are and they are Worth. Every. Penny. Help us keep them teaching during our first few months of growth.

We feel the best way to reward you for contributing to our campaign is to get you to come and play with us, so we're offering access perks- free classes, memberships, private lessons. If you would like to support us from afar and you feel it is unlikely you will make it to New York to use your perk, please consider "paying it forward." For every contributor who chooses to Pay It Forward, the value of your perk with be added to our scholarship fund to provide access to low-income individuals and families.


**If you want to pay your perk forward, please send us a message to let us know. Thank you!

This isn't just another place to work out. It's not just a gym, or a business, or a way to lose weight. Something unique, invaluable, and extraordinary happens at the MSMB. Why believe us? We asked our members to fill you in...

"What I like most about my experience training with MSMB is simply the learning process; the progression of skills, how they're connected and how they're used. Each time I show up for a session I'm always learning something new or a new way to look at something old, as though, in rereading a favorite book, you find unfamiliar, unexplored pages."

~Kyle C, Bronx NY~

 "...focused classes on addressing students' areas for improvement, building on existing capacities and sharing new and relevant information."

~Jay B, Manila PH~

"Solid, methodical instruction with great attention to helpful details. A great mix of theory and application.
The environment is one that gently removes egos and replaces them with the opportunity to really forge yourself. You leave with much more than you came in with."

~Mike W, Brooklyn NY~

"... great use of founts of experiential learning and of oral traditions.  These are the alternative universities that are available only to the student who has the courage and resourcefulness to seek beyond what is pro-scripted and familiar..."

~Dagan B, Brooklyn NY~

Spread the Word!

Whether or not you're able to contribute to the fundraiser, there are other ways to help us out, too. This is a grassroots campaign, and our success is measured in participation. Let's make some noise, New York!

  • Share this online as far and wide as possible! Facebook, Instagram, Twitter- anything you use to communicate online, talk us up. Indiegogo has a column of sharing tools along the left-hand side of the screen. Click those buttons!
  • Email. Do you have pals that eschew the time-consumptive nature of social media sites? Or maybe they've just got too many friends to keep up? Drop 'em an email to let them know what's going on!
  • Talk about us face-to-face. Have you been to an MSMB class or event? Kali? Capoeira? Qi Gong? Yoga? Tell everyone you meet about your experience. Not been, but are super excited about trying us out? Great! Get your friends excited too!

The more people know, the stronger we'll be.
story_txt:
Since 2006,  Njoli Brown and his team of all-star instructors have been offering classes in capoeira, Filipino martial arts, yoga, Afro-Brazilian Dance and general fitness/development programs in parks, schools and wellness venues throughout the city, across the country and internationally! MSMB was started in 2015 by Njoli Brown as a way to offer all of these elements under one roof.  Adults and youths can access all of the benefits of elite martial arts, fitness and wellness training. In addition to offering a playful, fun, and skill-oriented route to fitness, MSMB will act as a community hub, hosting social events and building lasting friendships.

Now we want to give our dream a place to hang its hat!

After long discussions with instructors, students and community members, we realized how many people were traveling all over the city to fill the holes left in their training and in their search for holistic wellness. We also found ourselves running from place to place in order to bring the best services to the communities we felt it important to serve.  Teaming up with some of the best martial arts, movement arts, fitness and wellness instructors from the region, the decision was made to open MSMB in New York City.

Here is where you come in. Starting a business takes a lot of money. We are not wealthy entrepreneurs, but we are skilled teachers, experienced business people, and passionate movement enthusiasts. We want to provide a space for movers of all kinds to come together, learn new things, make new friends, grow, and thrive. But we need your help to make this happen.




Here is what we need to make this real

Our goal is to raise $30,000 to make this the most epic of projects happen.
Here is what we need:



Space to move in! We need a lot of floor space and a bit of height. We'll need to give our landlord a deposit and show them that we can pay a few months rent up front.
Improvements to that space! Because of our physical requirements, we're looking at industrial spaces. It might be pretty raw when we move in. We expect we'll need to put in some flooring, install and rig some equipment, paint a bit, maybe build some walls, improve the bathrooms... anything that needs to be done to the space itself to make it a place you want to come and play in.







Toys! We will need various styles of yoga mats, crash pads, heavy bags, speed bags, instruments, free weights... Some of these things are very cheap (boxing & mma gloves!), but some of them are not at all (bags and weights...) and all together it adds up very quickly. The more we can raise, the more toys you all get to play with and the more gear to support your growth!
Amazing teachers! We'd love to believe that our doors will be beaten down on day one by all of New York's excited up and coming elite athletes! But let's be real; it takes time for a business to grow. We know the first few months will be tight, and we want to be ready for it. Our biggest operational expense will be our teachers' pay. They are the reason you will want to keep coming back here. They make us who we are and they are Worth. Every. Penny. Help us keep them teaching during our first few months of growth.




We feel the best way to reward you for contributing to our campaign is to get you to come and play with us, so we're offering access perks- free classes, memberships, private lessons. If you would like to support us from afar and you feel it is unlikely you will make it to New York to use your perk, please consider "paying it forward." For every contributor who chooses to Pay It Forward, the value of your perk with be added to our scholarship fund to provide access to low-income individuals and families.



**If you want to pay your perk forward, please send us a message to let us know. Thank you!

story:
In Summary

Periods can be the worst. From puberty to menopause, women experience all of the unglamorous, painful, and downright ickiness that being a women can entail. Many of us experience this with the help of sanitary feminine products and pain killers. However, what about the women who don’t have access to these items? 

I was stunned when I realized that homeless women did not have ready access to feminine products during their periods. I mean, it makes sense, but I had never thought about it. For the past few weeks I couldn't stop thinking about how it should not be a luxury to have access to pads and tampons. It should be a right, especially when having a period is a fact of biology, not a conscious decision. So I decided to do something about it by starting Dignity For All. 

Dignity For All is a non-profit project that aims to provide feminine hygiene products to women who could not otherwise afford them. We believe that dignity is not a luxury, and that all women should have access to safe, comfortable, and clean periods. We work with homeless outreach programs throughout the Dallas-Fort Worth area to provide small kits of these products to women who need them.

Each kit consists of enough tampons and sanitary napkins to last one full menstrual cycle. We also enclose small packets of ibuprofen, cleansing wipes, and some chocolate. They are packaged in a discreet and portable bag and taken to shelters in the area to be dispersed.

What We Need

What do we need? We need funds. We are starting this project out with $0 in the bank, and so we are relying fully on the generosity of you and your donations. Any amount is accepted and appreciated. 

Even if we do not reach our goal of $500, at the end of this campaign we will use whatever money is donated to purchase the materials to make as many kits as possible.* 

The Impact

With your donation, you will impact the lives of numerous homeless women within the DFW area. We are working with organizations in the area such as Arlington Life Shelter and Mission Arlington to disperse our kits. Just $20 can provide up to six kits. That means that you can give someone a safer, cleaner month for less than you would pay for a gallon of gas. 

Our mission is to provide every woman with the materials she needs to have a healthy, clean, more comfortable period. That’s it. It’s a big job, but we believe that with the kindness and generosity of others, we can accomplish anything.

Because everyone deserves dignity.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate, no worries! Share us on Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, and whatever else the kids are using these days. Our number one obstacle is people not even knowing this issue exists, so help us get the word out! Tell your friends and encourage them to donate. Together, we can make clean, comfortable periods a reality for everyone.

*Excluding the money used to cover credit card and Indiegogo fees

story:
Help support cancer research with our technology based fundraising program.  Our  programs are unique and break the mold of the standard magazine/candy fundraisers so many organizations offer.

Straight forward and to the point, 10footcords.com is exactly what we say we are, a company that specializes in 10 foot cords for mobile devices.  The short cord, well that’s for the other guy, the 10 foot cord is for the person looking for freedom from sitting near the outlet.   

We are launching on Indiegogo to bring awareness to this great new fundraising opportunity.  It also allows us to fund different causes that have affected all of us in some way.  Look for other campaigns in the near future.

Since I live in Columbus, Ohio, the first will be a scarlet and gray campaign.  This will help fund the James Cancer Hospital through a great charity, the Pelotonia.  Visit pelotonia.org to find out more about this great organization.  Teams we will be donating to include Team Bexley and Team COPC.  I rode for team COPC last year, and I know many members of Team Bexley.  These are great Pelotons that have raised over 1.5 million dollars for a cure for cancer since 2008. 

Unlike other campaigns that ask you to donate, we are asking you to donate and in return you will get high quality products you will use everyday. 

Our cords are the highest quality cords.  Our Apple lightning cords are Apple MFI certified.  This means that our cord manufacturer has been approved by Apple, and our specific 10 foot cord has been sent to and examined by Apple, and meets or exceeds Apple’s specifications.  (PPID number is available upon request).

Our android cords exceed specifications.  We have tested many 10 foot android cords and noticed some didn’t charge as fast.  When we discovered this, we had a discussion with our manufacturer, changed the cords to 2 amps, made other slight changes, and Presto! rapid charging and data transfer. 

We ask you support our efforts to launch our fundraising division.  In return, you will receive the finest 10 foot cord on the planet, and most importantly 15% of gross sales will be donated to the causes and charities for each campaign.  Choose one, choose all! You’ll be glad you did :)

Our timeline for these campaigns is to make sure you will have your cords in time for the holidays, if not before.  No matter what holiday you celebrate, these will make great and unique gifts that will be appreciated.

The products you will receive.

The difference of distance is clear.  10 foot cords, the obvious choice.

story:
We've been raising funds at the Clydebank Post and Helensburgh Advertiser but our last crowdfunder is now offline. We've still to collect many of our donations, so please donate here. Alicia Jordan has defied death a number of times, and has spent more than 30 hours in surgery. Despite being in and out of hospital she has prevailed and battles on. We're raising money to help her devoted mother Natalie get her the equipment she needs to develop. She needs £6,000 to get a dream sensory hut, a unit which will help Alicia's cognitive behaviour develop. We urge people to support this campaign and give what they can.

We at the Clydebank Post and Helensburgh Advertise have just ran the Polaroid 10k in Clydebank for Alicia and appeal to people to give what they can for our fundraising efforts. 

Henry Ainslie, the editor of the Helensburgh, has ran ALL FOUR races around West Dunbartonshire, and will do the final one on Sunday, June 7.

story:
My Story

I am a mother who wants the best for my child. My daughter had eczema. After concerns grew over the steroid skin creams that my daughter was being prescribed, I set out to find a better alternative. That was the genesis of Flowers N Flames personal care products.

I discovered how many of the things we use everyday, and consider necessities, have been manufactured to do us bodily harm. In finding a way to do better for my family and I, I want to offer something to the community, as well.  We have been deceived by mass marketing. Now, I can share something that is beneficial and useful for health and be informative too.  After healing my daughter's eczema with a moisturizing scrub, and body butter, I created other personal care products that we use everyday.

 

Where does the backing go and what do contributors get?

Once I created a few prototypes for my family and me, I also gave samples to my friends to test out. The feedback that I received was beyond what I was expecting. I decided to organize my creative endeavors into a legal entity.  My partner and I named it Flowers N Flames. Up to this point,  the company has been self - funded. However, I need a little bit of help.

This is what the $2,600 will go towards:

  • 25 percent of all proceeds will go into a contingency fund for the future. This is to ensure that we can provide better service and correct any issues or frumbles that may occur with things like shipping, etc.
  • $500 will go towards a few festivals and bazaars. Festival season presents many opportunities and vending space comes with a fee
  • $500 goes towards marketing budget
  • $300 goes towards an official website development and maintenance 
  •  Proceeds will also cover printing costs for the labels. We plan to outsource another small business for our printing needs here in the Atlanta area.
  • A portion of the proceeds will go towards placement of Flowers N Flames products in a few local coops in the Atlanta area. 
  • Packaging and more supplies are also needed

Perks and the role of contributors

  • Every backer than contributes a minimum of $15 will receive product. A "Thank You" is free and impersonal. I want my contributors to actually experience what I am creating.   
  • I want the feedback of my supporters: Do you like it? How can my products be improved? What are some flavor and scents you would like to see produced? What is your Flowers N Flames experience?

If I do not reach my goal of $2,600, I will still remain encouraged and continue to create in order to fully fund the 2,600 that I am seeking to launch my line. The top priorities will be addressed first regardless if the total goal is met.

The impact of your contribution

By supporting this campaign, you are helping  a newly established small business make it through the first operational year. You will also be given a healthier alternative to try for yourself. Our products are valuable because there is a demand for personal care products that do not contain harmful chemicals.  The contribution is deeper than just monetary support. I want your feedback on what we have developed and future products that we plan to offer.

Risks & Challenges

One of the biggest challenges that  I face is: This is a new business. There is always a risk  of failure when starting something new. I have already established Flowers N Flames and registered it legally with both the IRS and the state.  I have already purchased approximately 80 percent of the supplies that  I need outside of the packaging. I have a small but strong support system. People are excited to try these products. With that being said,I have narrowed down the major risks to these two things:

  • Not only is this a new venture, but this is my first time attempting a venture like this one.  Not all of my customers will be located in Atlanta, Georgia. Outside of consignment, I am already planning to ship the majority of our products to people. With that being said, something could go wrong with shipping such as delays and damages. Other fees and charges could arise as well. That is why 25% of all proceeds are designated to start a contingency fund that will keep growing. 25% of the funds from this campaign is only the seed money to start that fund.
  • The deodorant isn't ideal for everyone. I designed this deodorant to neutralize odors and provide a mild scent. The goal was to avoid a heavy fragrance, commercial-like deodorant. This is not an anti-antiperspirant either. Perspiration is natural. That is how we eliminate toxins from our body. In addition to that, this deodorant is designed to: detox the armpits/glands, and balance the PH. This is a great product but not for everyone. 

Can you help?

The point of this campaign is to raise awareness to what I am doing and reach my financial goal so that  I can smoothly operate this company and create more personal care products.Whether you can or cannot contribute financially, I could still use your help. Sharing this campaign will do so much. Indiegogo has a host of sharing tools for all of your social media. This campaign is only for 30 days. I need all of the eyes and support I can get on this campaign.

You can mix and match your order. for instance. If you actually want to contribute $50 But would like to try the deodorant and tattoo salve only instead of the body butter and scrub, that option is available. Just simply message me and let me know.  Lip Balms automatically come with every order of $15 or more.

 

THANK YOU

story:
Got a buck? $1 is all we need! 

SquadRally.com is a start up company that myself and my business partner are developing and is scheduled for release by end of May. 

Our site will bring sports fans together across the United States and in all other areas of the globe. With a simple registration to this site you can now find out where other fans of YOUR team will be meeting to watch the next big game whether it be a restaurant, pub or bar. You can also create your own events!

Although the site is already in development we still lack the capital for the advertising, maintenance, marketing, fees etc. That's where you come in. We're only asking for a $1 minimum donation to anyone who might be interested. If you want to help us out click on the link below. 

Your generosity will not go overlooked ;)

story:
Summary

My name is Dr Thomas Webb, I have a Ph.D. in Pharmacy. I am currently studying medicine at Imperial College in London. My colleague Dominic Marshall and I have designed an antibiotic molecule that has a completely novel structure and mechanism of action. Based on data in the literature, we strongly believe that our Super-Antibiotic could kill some of the most antibiotic-resistant bacteria on the planet. The theory behind the antibiotic has been validated by a number of senior academics.

With antibiotic-resistant bacteria growing in numbers worldwide and becoming resistant to a wider range of antibiotics, it is troubling that development of new antibiotics has virtually stopped. 

According to the Center for Disease Control in the USA, antibiotic-resistant bacteria cost the US economy $20bn each year and, more importantly kill thousands of people. 

We are attempting to raise £10,000 (approximately $16,500 USD) in order to have a small quantity of our antibiotic synthesized so that it can be tested. If the data confirm that the antibiotic works, GlaxoSmithKline plc have said that they would be interested in discussing it with us.

This is an exciting opportunity to help us attempt to save the lives of thousands of people.


This is a link to the interview I gave for the Imperial College Podcast about the project:

http://wwwf.imperial.ac.uk/imedia/content/view/4049/a-new-antibiotic/


If you would like more information or would like to become involved in the project, please contact me at thomas.webb12@imperial.ac.uk or 07742 945508.

story: My team, The Boise State Abraxans, are going to US Quidditch Cup 9 in South Carolina to play against teams from all over the country! I would love to go cheer them on, along with other west/northwest teams! I'm so proud of everything they've done to get where they're at. But I don't have the money for a plane ticket. Any money would help! And I will love you forever! Thanks! DFTBA!

story:
We're now accepting preorders on our website..  Head on to https://smartypans.io and get yours now!

Imagine a pan that could teach you how to cook with it's built-in 1000+ recipes and can also help you reach your fitness goals with it's real time nutrition tracking.

Meet SmartyPans, a smart cooking pan made in Upstate New York!






1) Computes Nutrition & Documents Your Recipe

    


 


     


     

     



2) Guides You With Step-By-Step Cooking Instructions


   


    


    

     


The brains of SmartyPans is an encrypted bluetooth enabled microchip.  But that's not what makes it smart.  We designed the pan from the ground up, for utility.  One pan serves as a cooking pan, kitchen scale, oven pan and a serving bowl.  It's not just the technology in the pan that makes it smart, it's the utility!  

All funds raised on Indiegogo, will go towards buying materials and shipping.  We invested our own resources for tooling, manufacturing and assembly.  

Any project has an inherent set of risks and challenges associated with it.  We have taken utmost care and planned our project to mitigate most of those risks.   We even made a functional product before we came to Indiegogo.  Now, it's just a matter of manufacturing in a larger volume.  
We also have Marquardt Group, one of the best manufacturers in the world as our advisor and investor.   Marquardt has almost a century of manufacturing to their credit.  Their experience and expertise further averts challenges associated with hardware projects.

However, in case of any unforeseen risk, we'll keep the communication with you backers open and transparent.  

1) Does it come with non-stick coating?
Absolutely, yes!  SmartyPans comes with ceramic non-stick coating which fares better than it's PTFE (Teflon) counterpart.

2) Does it work on induction cooktops?
Yes, it does.  The base of the pan is layered with ferrite powder which gives this aluminum pan a magnetic property, allowing it to operate on induction cooktops.

3) How sensitive are the sensors?
The weight sensors are accurate to 0.5 grams and can weigh a maximum weight of 6 kilo-grams. The temperature sensor can measure a maximum of 1250 °C. 

4) How do you protect electronics from high heat?
Designing the sensor enclosures to withstand high heat is part of our invention and we have already filed a patent for the same.  The weight sensor can withstand 600 °C (1112 °F), the temperature sensor can withstand 700 °C ( 1292 °F).  The battery and the chip are installed in a special fiberglass enclosure which is installed at the far end of the handle, which remains constant at room temperature.

5) How do I charge the battery?
SmartyPans comes with a rechargeable AA battery that would last ~751 hours with a single charge.  Remove the battery from the battery compartment, just like you would change your remote control batteries and charge it using a wall charger.  

6) Is SmartyPans dishwasher safe?
YES!  The entire pan is dishwasher safe.  However, we made the cooking surface detachable, so, you can wash it separately and save some water if you don't need to wash the whole pan!

7) Can I put SmartyPans in the oven?
You can put the detachable top pan in the oven; not the whole pan.

8) Will the app be available for iOS and Android?
Yes, we will release the app on both iOS and Android app stores.

9) Can I use multiple pans with one app?
Yes.  Each pan has a unique id and our app identifies one pan from another.  

10) What Fitness and Nutrition apps are supported?
We will be starting off with MyFitnessPal, FitBit and Google Fit.  Add others later on.

story:
Short Summary

Our team was established because we value people to people interactions. While current social platforms have many amazing purposes, it actually creates barriers in fostering real life relationships. Current social media is monetized and valued by how much time people spend on the platforms themselves, and that is redundant in actually incentivizing people to forgo technology for human interaction.

With no easy alternative, we set out to find a solution. Our ultimate goal? To create a social platform that will focus not on sharing the past, but on planning for the future. To connect and bridge users to their local surroundings and friends. 

We hope to work with newer mobile technologies and business models to disrupt the current social media scene. This is ActiLivi

What We Need & What You Get

We have been working on this application for almost a year and we are ready to share with the world our brain child. This indiegogo campaign will fund an intensive summer program to finish a working prototype and more importantly, gain more spotlight on our project.

We will use all proceedings into the actual creation of a prototype, including designs, videos, and legal support. Our company only has a self funded seed of $40,000 so  any extra support will greatly accelerate our process and improve the details of the prototype and product.


The Impact

Our integrated system can solve many problems all within a sleek user interface.

1. Scheduling is difficult?: How many hours and days does it take for you to just arrange a time to go to the movies with friends? First you email/text/message to find a time that works, then you have to worry about what movie is showing and have to discuss it all over again; the whole process is cumbersome and can even deter you from proceeding. 

Our app can help you find a working time and make reservations/book tickets for you all within a few taps! Once a consensus is reached, an event is automatically created on all your calendars and there will be many tools to aid you in having an enjoyable experience.

2. Ever wonder why everyone has to type in the same event to their calendars that hundreds of other people have already created? Tired of creating details for that one class with all the TA hours, help sessions, and homework due dates? With our application, its as easy as search, tap, and add! Everything you need will automatically be added to your calendar and organized without a single letter of typing. 

Future updates and the desktop application in the future will allow a multitude of different social space for you to interact with other people within the event!

3. Difficult to promote and manage events? Current social media does not help in getting accurate head counts and can be quite difficult in reaching the right groups of people. Its very easy to have your event get lost in thousands of other posts, events, tweets. Our application not only helps you get accurate attendee lists, reach the right people, and better connect you with your local population, it also sports many different tools to craft the most beautiful events that you can be proud to share and look back on.

4. Hard to find information on whats happening around you? Have free time but do not know what to do? As a database of events, we are organized to constantly keep you in the loop and let you be aware of whats happening around you. 

Love orchestra music and hate how you always miss out on the latest performances? You can stay subscribed and we will provide you subtle notifications to make sure you will be there when Yo-Yo Ma comes into town. 

Tired of looking up when the next basketball game is? We will keep you updated so that you never have to waste time searching through the internet again. 

Social media is a good place for seeing what has happened in the past, but by the time you see it on your feed, you might have already been too late.


With further updates and addition of supporting products such as a desktop companion, we hope to be the social platform that helps you get excited about the future. 

Risks & Challenges

It is hard to break into the calendar market. Many people have many different preferences and could be reluctant to adopt a newer kind of calendar unless they perceive great changes. Another issue is that even though privacy is our number one priority and all functions of the application has been designed with security in mind, the concept of any sharing of any portion of a calendar can deter some users.

The final product will require a lot more work than what our small team can accomplish in a short amount of time. We would need a successful seed round fundraising to create a satisfactory product in a reasonable amount of time.


Other Ways You Can Help

We are still looking for backend server-sided programmers (or people familiar with parse). 

Please spread this around social media if you think it will be a valuable tool! We certainly think it is, and am excited to bring this to everyone.

story:
It all starts with a good night's sleep...


We spend about one third of our life sleeping. Many of us try to shorten this time and fill it with "more productive" activities. However, this eventually works against us as sleep deprivation has negative effects on our productivity, mood and health 

30% of people in the USA suffer from occasionally sleep disorder or insomnia (The Harvard Medical School Guide)

Technology is trying to aid this sleep deprivation epidemic in the modern world. But our research found that most sleep aid devices on the market are only slightly more advanced alarm clocks, that don't provide a true sleep solution. This is what drove us to develop the Somnus system.


Somnus system for perfect sleep


Somnus System

The Somnus system consists of 3 elements:

  1. Somnus 

  2. Saturn tracker

  3. Somnus mobile app 


Somnus - fall asleep easily, sleep better and wake up refreshed 


Somnus has 3  sleep programs and 3 supplementary programs to help you fall asleep quickly, sleep deep, and wake up energized! The programs are very easy to use  and manage with Somnus mobile app as explain as below:


I. Pre-Sleep Phase



The best way to fall asleep smoothly and sleep soundly is to relax. The Somnus Easy sleep program is designed to simulate natural sleep environment our bodies got used to throughout human evolution, way before civilization with its artificial lighting and numerous distractions.  

  • Sunset simulation prepares your body to fall asleep by gradually decreasing light.
  • Sound or music  will help you neutralize other distracting noises. 
  • Negative ions and essential oil aroma will make your body and mind feel as if you were outdoors.



II. Sleep Phase



During your sleep, Somnus will continue to monitor your bedroom environmental data, tracking your sleep quality and recording the light and noise that disturb your sleep. Also, with the continuing of the soft music, negative ions or white noise and essential oil aroma helping you switch from light sleep to deep sleep smoothly.


III. Pre-Wake Up/Wake Up Phase



Somnus’s Smart Wake Up program detects when you have entered your light sleep cycle and uses a combination of sound and negative ions to wake you up at your highest possible energy level. Once you are fully awake, Somnus will say "Good Morning, Master!" to wake you up warmly. 



Power Nap

Somnus's Power Nap program helps you doze off for 10~30 minutes, and recharge your body and mind, whenever you feel like it. Napping has been scientifically proven to improve your overall health and mood, while encouraging creativity. See what Winston Churchill had to say about napping:

Nature has not intended mankind to work from eight in the morning until midnight without that refreshment of blessed oblivion which, even if it only lasts twenty minutes, is sufficient to renew all the vital forces.

Supplementary Programs


Negative Ionizer 

Generates millions of negative ions and disperses them into the air. Negative ions bind with particulates in the air - such as floating fungi, dust and pollen - causing them to descend to the floor, helping to prevent allergies. Most importantly, the negative ions also act like airborne vitamins, helping to refresh your lungs and rejuvenate your brain and body.


Vitaroma Diffuser 

Diffuses essential oils into the air to create a pleasing and relaxing atmosphere. Your room will smell like a spring meadow full of flowers, trees, plants, and refresh air! Take a deep breath and experience the beauty of nature! 

According to the National Sleep Foundation:

In order to get a better sleep, you should surround yourself with scents you like. For example, lavender may decrease your heart rate and blood pressure. Soothing scents can improve your mood and help you prepare to sleep.

Vitaroma Diffuser Technology is patent pending.


Relaxation Lights 

Choose program with different color lights you preferred to display together with the Vitaroma program and music you like to create the wonderful relaxing environment.

 

Sound and Music 

Somnus has an ambient sound conditioner feature. You can choose from selections such as white noise, pink noise or calming rain to improve your sleep. It also has prerecorded soft music to help you get to sleep and the smart alarm features music to wake you up at the right point in your sleep cycle. You can also upload the MP3 music you like to Somnus for playing back.


Gesture Operation

Somnus also has a user-friendly gesture operations design for your convenient to use. The video is shown below.





 

Saturn Tracker - track your sleep and more


Somnus comes with a tracking device called Saturn tracker. It is a 32-bit MCU with precise 3D accelerometer, capable of sensing your movements throughout the day and night. Come nightfall, it tracks how long you slept, light sleep, sound sleep and awake and a result of sleep score will show you in your mobile app the next day. It comes with a clip and a wristband.



The data stored in the Saturn tracker is all then synced seamlessly via Bluetooth Low Energy to your mobile phone. No worrying about pairing or syncing, it just works!


The Saturn tracker battery lasts for up to a month, depending on usage, so there is no need to charge it every day. It is also water-resistant.

If you have a partner they can wear the second Saturn tracker. The Saturn trackers are capable of recording each of your sleep activities separately, and Somnus can determine if your partner's snoring or movement is disturbing your sleep.


Smart Silent Alarm

Saturn is also designed to have a Smart Silent Alarm function, you only need to clip it to your pajamas or wear it on your wrist. Once it detects your correct wake up time near to the alarm you set, it will then gently vibrate to wake you up, without disturbing your partner.




Somnus Mobile app

The Somnus mobile app integrates all of the above features together into easy to use iPhone and Android apps.

The app will display your sleep result of previous night. 

First, it will show you the amount of time you spend in light sleep, sound sleep, awake, what time you woke up, what time you fell asleep, time spent in bed and give you a Sleep Score based on this information.



Second, it will display the time stamped record of interruptions to your sleep from external conditions or disturbances. Allowing you to play them back later and determine the specific causes, such as loud noises or intruding lights.

The app also have prepare some tips and solutions for you to improve your sleep as well. It supports the cloud service for remote access to your bedroom environmental data.  

As Seen In


HWtrek - Somnus systems comes to the rescue for those sleepless nights





Specifications


Design


Somnus takes its inspiration from a pebble rounded to perfection by the flow of a river. It delivers the sound of the river, the light from the sun and the fresh air from the woods. Its stylish design fits into your room and the precise sensors and software work perfectly together to help you get the best sleep of your life.


Somnus is available in two simple colors: 

  1. Pebble white 
  2. Pebble black. 

The Saturn tracker is currently only available in black.


What's Inside?

We have integrated all of the electronic parts on printed circuit boards. There is no signal interference. The speaker, blower fan, ionizer, LEDs, and sensors have been integrated in an innovative way to fit into a relatively small case. The result is a masterpiece of engineering on the inside and a masterpiece of design on the outside.


Is Somnus for you?

If you are reading this - probably yes. Sleep deprivation is a modern epidemic. Somnus is for everyone who cares about their sleep. If you want to be healthy and want to have a better sleep then Somnus is for you!


How We Got Here

For the past 10 months we have worked, in cooperation with Sleep Center of Medical University in Taiwan, to come up with the most comprehensive and technologically advanced sleep aid. We've studied a variety of medical information, including from The US National Sleep Foundation and Harvard Medical School, in order to develop a revolutionary sleep-aid system. We choose the best possible combination of sleep aid devices and then put all our efforts into designing, coding, prototyping, testing, simulating, modifying and refining them into a single, revolutionary sleep product.


Our Chung Shan Medical School Research Team


Below pictures show the measurement of brain wave during exercise and sleep. From the experiments we found that the theta wave not only display in sleep but also appear after certain amount of exercise. We assume the exercise may also helps the brain to do detoxication like University of Rochester Medical Center research team found - the glymphatic system helps to clean the harmful wastes of brain during sleep.


Also, from our lighting experiments the dimming red light and sound or music will trigger your drowsiness if together with the negative ions and essential oil aroma you will fall asleep quickly. First of all, fall asleep easily and sleep soundly are the keys of good quality of sleep and Smart wake up become an icing on the cake!


Source: About Health          Reference: TEDEd


Where We Are Now

We have completed our second EVT build (engineering validation testing) to incorporate a number of changes and improvements we discovered in first EVT, which involved mechanical, electronic, manufacturing, assembling and testing the functionality of all the sensors involved in Somnus and the communication with the Mercury.

We are now moving into DVT (design verification testing) and will complete by 6/30 where we will test everything: from the mechanical and electronic, to firmware and software to make sure everything works as designed.



Next Steps

The final stage is PVT (production verification testing), which is designed to make sure the production quality is 100% after assembly, testing and final inspection on the production line. Our manufacturing partners have over 20 years of manufacturing experience and have built and shipped millions of devices. They can guarantee that a quality product will be shipped to our backers and customers.



Building with Somnus

You can access your data anytime through our convenient app. You can also upload the data to your PC. It's your data, you can do whatever you want with it.

We are constantly on the lookout for products which can synergize with Somnus, and are seeking new partners for product integration.

We want to know from you, the user, what you think of Somnus. We believe that a healthy dialogue with our customers can help make our product even better! 

Our team

We are a team of IT designers, engineers, operation staff and consultants who work in the sleep center of a medical university based in Taiwan. Collectively, we have over 100 years of experience in building products and services for international customers around the world.


Why we need your help


Our mission is to create the technology necessary to improve the health and life of our customers. We have completed the design and prototyping of our first product, Somnus, but we need your help to get it into production. With your help, we can make Somnus a reality, and carry on further sleep brainwave research for improving Somnus to help you get the best sleep of your life! 


Why Indiegogo?

A quality sleep is important to everyone. We chose Indiegogo because we believe that the public needs our product. We thrive on the feedback and support of our backers and believe that they can ultimately help us to make a better product for everyone.


After Service

No worry about the after service, we will have our service offices in California, USA; Amsterdam, Nederland, Europe; Shanghai, China; Tokyo, Japan and in Taipei, Taiwan. 


Perks





Note: Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.



Thank You

We’d like to send a big big big thank you to our AMAZING support systems:

HWTrek - the world's platform for bringing hardware to life.

PT Studio Co.

Hoyi Global Co.

Ian, Norman and Paul G.

Our friends, families, and everyone that helped review the Indiegogo page. Most importantly, we’d like to thank all our backers for making you and our dream come true to help more people to get back their health from better sleep. We love you!


FAQ

When do I get Somnus?

Somnus system is scheduled to ship in early October. We will start shipping Somnus to backers based on pledge order, so the sooner you back, the sooner yours will arrive.

Will you ship internationally?

Yes.  But there is a shipping cost will be charged if your country is out of USA.

Does the Somnus need to be set up every single night?

No. It does not. Somnus is configured only once after installation and then works seamlessly in the background. It will automatically warn you if your environment isn’t ideal before you sleep, so you can adjust it.

What devices are compatible with Somnus?

We are focused on providing the best possible experience for mobile applications right now. We will share a full list of compatible devices closer to our release date.

So at this moment Somnus supports iPhone 4S, 5S, 6 or newer, iPod Touch 5G, iPad 3G or newer, or an Android phone Samsung Galaxy S4, S5 and S6, HTC One and Desire. Please check with your product provider that your device has WiFi and Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) support.

Does Somnus work with Apple Health kit and Google Fit?

Our app is work with Apple Health Kit and Google Fit in step walk, distance, calories burned and sleep data.

Is Somnus always recording the sound in my room?

No, only when you sleep like snoring, sleep talking, loud disturbances and car alarm during the night. And all these key events are recorded in Somnus flash memory and sync to your mobile the next day and you can play back via Somnus app so you can see what happened at last night.

How many Saturn trackers do I need?

You need one Saturn tracker for each person. Our app will display information separately for each person, so those who share the same bed can track their sleep behavior individually.

What if I sleep with no pillow or multiple pillows? Where should I put my Saturn?

Saturn is special design for activity tracking comes with a clip and a wristband for your convenient, you can clip for pillow or wearing over your wrist, so it solve all the issues on with or without pillow.

Do I need another Somnus if I have two Saturn trackers?

No, one single Somnus is enough and the two Saturn trackers will pair with your mobile phone seamlessly.

How does one Somnus handle two Saturn trackers?

Somnus and Saturn trackers are working independently but will sync to mobile phone via Somnus system app and become one with the same time stamp. It will recorded all the mutual interference you did and the disturbances to one bedroom then sync with different mobiles individually.

If you have two Saturn trackers can you use two phones for tracking each person or can you use only one phone for tracking both?

Your Saturn tracker is fully independent from your partner’s Saturn tracker. Your Saturn tracker is intended to be used exclusively by you, as it measures your sleep patterns over time. The Saturn tracker is tied to your phone; it is linked to your Somnus app account. Once you’ve installed the app on your phone, only your data will appear. With your password only you can login to see the data. You can’t use one phone for tracking both.

Does my phone need to be connected to Somnus and Saturn tracker the whole time?

First, Somnus is working in background independently with your mobile phone during the night, so it does not need to be connected the whole time. You can even leave it off or outside the bedroom entirely. Second, Saturn is also working in back ground independently during the night, it does not need to be connected with your mobile the whole time too. Somnus and Saturn are connected to your phone when you activate the Somnus app.

I am concerned about privacy. Will my sleep data leave my local network?

To protect the privacy all your personal data only sync to your mobile phone and store in it. After that you may upload to your private cloud or your PC. You can share to your OneNote/Evernote/Dropbox or email and message. Most importantly your data is yours. And the environment data is under your select yes or no transmitted securely over SSL to Amazon Web Services then you can access to know the current temperature, humidity and air quality of your bedroom remotely.

Will the app also have a Celsius measurement, a 24-hour clock and different languages?

Yes, it can be configured to Celsius and 24-hour clock. For current release, it will be English only. Other languages will be released in 1~2 quarters later.

 

What will the Smart Alarm be like?

We will have numerous alarm sounds to pick from. You will be able to customize the alarm sound and adjust the volume from the mobile app. If you have the tendency to oversleep, the Smart Alarm is persistent enough to wake you up.
story_txt:
It all starts with a good night's sleep...

We spend about one third of our life sleeping. Many of us try to shorten this time and fill it with "more productive" activities. However, this eventually works against us as sleep deprivation has negative effects on our productivity, mood and health 
30% of people in the USA suffer from occasionally sleep disorder or insomnia (The Harvard Medical School Guide)

Technology is trying to aid this sleep deprivation epidemic
in the modern world. But our research found that most sleep aid devices on
the market are only slightly more advanced alarm clocks, that don't provide a
true sleep solution. This is what drove us to develop the Somnus system.


Somnus system for perfect sleep


Somnus System
The Somnus system consists of 3 elements:


Somnus 
Saturn tracker

Somnus mobile app 





Somnus - fall asleep easily, sleep better and wake up refreshed 

Somnus has 3  sleep programs and 3 supplementary programs to help you fall asleep quickly, sleep deep, and wake up energized! The programs are very easy to use  and manage with Somnus mobile app as explain as below:


I. Pre-Sleep Phase





The best way to fall asleep smoothly and sleep soundly is to relax.
The Somnus Easy sleep program is designed to simulate natural sleep environment our bodies got used to throughout human evolution, way before civilization with its artificial lighting and numerous distractions.  



Sunset simulation prepares your body to fall asleep by
gradually decreasing light.


Sound or music  will help you neutralize other distracting noises. 


Negative ions and essential oil aroma will make your body and mind feel as if you were outdoors.






II. Sleep Phase



During your sleep, Somnus will continue to monitor your bedroom environmental data, tracking your sleep quality and recording the light and noise that disturb your sleep. Also, with the continuing of the soft music, negative ions or white noise and essential oil aroma helping you switch from light sleep to deep sleep smoothly.

III. Pre-Wake Up/Wake Up Phase


Somnus’s Smart Wake Up program detects when you have entered your light sleep cycle and uses a combination of sound and negative ions to wake you up at your highest possible energy level. Once you are fully awake, Somnus will say "Good Morning, Master!" to wake you up warmly. 




Power Nap
Somnus's Power Nap program helps you doze off for 10~30 minutes, and recharge your body and mind, whenever you feel like it. Napping has been scientifically proven to improve your overall health and mood, while encouraging creativity. See what Winston Churchill had to say about napping:
Nature has not intended mankind to work from eight in the morning until midnight without that refreshment of blessed oblivion which, even if it only lasts twenty minutes, is sufficient to renew all the vital forces.
Supplementary Programs



Negative Ionizer 

Generates millions of negative ions and disperses them into the air. Negative ions bind with particulates in the air - such as floating fungi, dust and pollen - causing them to descend to the floor, helping to prevent allergies. Most importantly, the negative ions also act like airborne vitamins, helping to refresh your lungs and rejuvenate your brain and body.


Vitaroma Diffuser 
Diffuses essential oils into the air to create a pleasing and relaxing atmosphere. Your room will smell like a spring meadow full of flowers, trees, plants, and refresh air! Take a deep breath and experience the beauty of nature! 
According to the National Sleep Foundation:
In order to get a better sleep, you should surround yourself with scents you like. For example, lavender may decrease your heart rate and blood pressure. Soothing scents can improve your mood and help you prepare to sleep.
Vitaroma Diffuser Technology is patent pending.





Relaxation Lights 
Choose program with different color lights you preferred to display together with the Vitaroma program and music you like to create the wonderful relaxing environment.

 
Sound and Music 
Somnus has an ambient sound conditioner feature. You can choose from selections such as white noise, pink noise or calming rain to improve your sleep. It also has prerecorded soft music to help you get to sleep and the smart alarm features music to wake you up at the right point in your sleep cycle. You can also upload the MP3 music you like to Somnus for playing back.

Gesture Operation
Somnus also has a user-friendly gesture operations design for your convenient to use. The video is shown below.





 

Saturn Tracker - track your sleep and more

Somnus comes with a tracking device called Saturn tracker. It is a 32-bit MCU with precise 3D accelerometer, capable of sensing your movements throughout the day and night. Come nightfall, it tracks how long you slept, light sleep, sound sleep and awake and a result of sleep score will show you in your mobile app the next day. It comes with a clip and a wristband.



The data stored in the Saturn tracker is all then synced seamlessly via Bluetooth Low Energy to your mobile phone. No worrying about pairing or syncing, it just works!





The Saturn tracker battery lasts for up to a month, depending on usage, so there is no need to charge it every day. It is also water-resistant.
If you have a partner they can wear the second Saturn tracker. The Saturn trackers are capable of recording each of your sleep activities separately, and Somnus can determine if your partner's snoring or movement is disturbing your sleep.

Smart Silent Alarm

Saturn is also designed to have a Smart Silent Alarm function, you only need to clip it to your pajamas or wear it on your wrist. Once it detects your correct wake up time near to the alarm you set, it will then gently vibrate to wake you up, without disturbing your partner.









Somnus Mobile app
The Somnus
mobile app integrates all of the above features together into easy to use
iPhone and Android apps.
The app will
display your sleep result of previous night. 
First, it will show you the amount
of time you spend in light sleep, sound sleep, awake, what time you woke up,
what time you fell asleep, time spent in bed and give you a Sleep Score based on this information. 




Second,
it will display the time stamped record of interruptions to your sleep from
external conditions or disturbances. Allowing you to play them back later and determine the specific causes, such as
loud noises or intruding lights.
The app also have prepare some tips and solutions for you to improve your sleep as well. It supports the cloud service for remote access to your bedroom environmental data.  




As Seen In

HWtrek - Somnus systems comes to the rescue for those sleepless nights



Specifications




Design
Somnus
takes its inspiration from a pebble rounded to perfection by the flow of a
river. It delivers the sound of the river, the light from the sun and the fresh
air from the woods. Its stylish design fits into your room and the precise
sensors and software work perfectly together to help you get the best sleep of
your life.




Somnus
is available in two simple colors: 


Pebble white 

Pebble black. 


The Saturn
tracker is currently only available in black.



What's Inside?
We
have integrated all of the electronic parts on printed circuit boards. There is
no signal interference. The speaker, blower fan, ionizer, LEDs,
and sensors have been integrated in an innovative way to fit into a relatively
small case. The result is a masterpiece of engineering on the inside and a
masterpiece of design on the outside.


Is Somnus for you?
If you are reading this - probably yes. Sleep deprivation is a modern epidemic. Somnus
is for everyone who cares about their sleep. If you want to be healthy and want
to have a better sleep then Somnus is for you!


How We Got Here
For
the past 10 months we have worked, in cooperation with Sleep Center of Medical
University in Taiwan, to come up with the most comprehensive and
technologically advanced sleep aid. We've studied a variety of medical
information, including from The US National Sleep Foundation and Harvard
Medical School, in order to develop a revolutionary sleep-aid system. We choose
the best possible combination of sleep aid devices and then put all our efforts
into designing, coding, prototyping, testing, simulating, modifying and
refining them into a single, revolutionary sleep product.



Our Chung Shan Medical School Research Team

Below pictures show the measurement of brain wave during exercise and sleep. From the experiments we found that the theta wave not only display in sleep but also appear after certain amount of exercise. We assume the exercise may also helps the brain to do detoxication like University of Rochester Medical Center research team found - the glymphatic system helps to clean the harmful wastes of brain during sleep.



Also, from our lighting experiments the dimming red light and sound or music will trigger your drowsiness if together with the negative ions and essential oil aroma you will fall asleep quickly. First of all, fall asleep easily and sleep soundly are the keys of good quality of sleep and Smart wake up become an icing on the cake!


Source: About Health          Reference: TEDEd



Where We Are Now
We
have completed our second EVT build (engineering validation testing) to
incorporate a number of changes and improvements we discovered in first EVT,
which involved mechanical, electronic, manufacturing, assembling and testing
the functionality of all the sensors involved in Somnus and the communication
with the Mercury.
We
are now moving into DVT (design verification testing) and will complete by 6/30
where we will test everything: from the mechanical and electronic, to firmware
and software to make sure everything works as designed.










Next Steps

The
final stage is PVT (production verification testing), which is designed to make
sure the production quality is 100% after assembly, testing and final
inspection on the production line. Our manufacturing partners have over 20
years of manufacturing experience and have built and shipped millions of
devices. They can guarantee that a quality product will be shipped to our
backers and customers.







Building with Somnus
You can access your data anytime
through our convenient app. You can also upload the data to your PC. It's your
data, you can do whatever you want with it.
We are constantly on the lookout for
products which can synergize with Somnus, and are seeking new partners for
product integration.
We want to know from you, the user,
what you think of Somnus. We believe that a healthy dialogue with our customers
can help make our product even better! 

Our team
We are a team of IT designers, engineers, operation staff and consultants who work in the sleep center of a medical university based in Taiwan. Collectively, we have over 100 years of experience in building products and services for international customers around the world.




Why we need your help

Our mission is to create the technology necessary to improve the health and life of our customers. We have completed the design and prototyping of our first product, Somnus, but we need your help to get it into production. With your help, we can make Somnus a reality, and carry on further sleep brainwave research for improving Somnus to help you get the best sleep of your life! 



Why Indiegogo?
A quality sleep is important to everyone. We chose Indiegogo because we believe that the public needs our product. We thrive on the feedback and support of our backers and believe that they can ultimately help us to make a better product for everyone.

After Service
No worry about the after service, we will have our service offices in California, USA; Amsterdam, Nederland, Europe; Shanghai, China; Tokyo, Japan and in Taipei, Taiwan. 
Perks

















Note: Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best
efforts and not guaranteed.


Thank You
We’d like to send a big big big thank you to our AMAZING support systems:


HWTrek - the world's platform for bringing hardware to life.


PT Studio Co.

Hoyi Global Co.
Ian, Norman and Paul G.
Our friends, families, and everyone that helped review the Indiegogo page. Most importantly, we’d like to thank all our backers for making you and our dream come true to help more people to get back their health from better sleep. We love you!

do I get Somnus?

story:
Lifelines for Everyone

Bright Halo is a small group of technologist with 60 years of combined experience. We are dedicated and passionate about building technologies to reduce injury or death to elderly and disabled persons. Your help will enable us to build and deploy Overwatch, a technology which will increase the likelihood that a disabled or elderly person will be evacuated safely during a large disaster.

Our initial goal is to perfect Overwatch and make it widely available to every organization or person that wants it. But, we also want to use the success of this campaign to convince states, companies, and schools that more should and can be done. While we have prototype software and a passionate team, there are lots to do before we reach the end.

Elderly & Disabled persons are likely to be killed as a result of Mass Disasters

The problem is that emergency notification systems are not very useful to at-risk persons. Unfortunately, today’s systems are not designed with disabled and elderly communities in mind. Elderly and disable persons living alone can’t always respond to emergency broadcasts effectively. Worst yet, because of sensory impairment, they may not be able to even receive an alert.

40% of the people who died in Katrina were elderly. Today, 1 of 5 persons has a legal disability. By 2016, there will be 74 million elderly persons will be living in the US.

Why should you care? Chances are that someone you know and love is elderly, living alone, has limited mobility, or has some other impairment that can endanger their lives. Whether it’s a grandparent, neighbor or friend, they can’t always have someone nearby to assist when they need it the most.

We are Responding Overwatch

Overwatch uses existing mobile technology to link vulnerable people to a central location. It provides situational awareness for both users and central monitoring locations.

Overwatch solves two key problems. First, it ensures that users get broadcasts in way that’s meaningful and understandable to them. Second, it helps them get out of a dangerous situation by working with emergency responders. These simple steps can make all the difference in the world for someone you care about.

What We Need & What You Get

The goal of this campaign is raise $60K USD so that we can complete development of Overwatch Enterprise software and also complete Overwatch development for iPhone and Android. Your contributions will also help us hire talented people to help promote, test, deploy and provide training to third parties.

$100K will let us make Overwatch available to big communities (500 or more people). You, our backers will vote to choose a town that will be the first to use Overwatch software. With the cooperation of the selected town/city, we will work to deploy and launch Overwatch for their vulnerable communities.

$200K USD will allow us to develop Overwatch for other types of phones. Android and iPhone is an important first step, but not everyone has these phones. This means that overwatch will become more accessible available.

$250K USD allows us to help any size organizations instead of just small ones.

Other Ways You Can Help

You have the chance to be part of a unique solution that may help someone during the next disaster.

Your voice and support are just as important as money. Please join our facebook page and follow us on Twitter. Let your school, city and company know that Bright Halo exists and that we exist to help them through this issue.

Please join us in this fight… Let our neighbors, friends and family know that you care. Contribute to be part of something that’s never been done before. Contribute to be a part of something that may one day save a life.
